Tura‑t: Layla El Mossadeq Ghabbar
Ɛumar Rraḍi ajurnalist amuɣrabi anekruf di Ɛukaca zi 29 yulyuz 2020.
Iḍeffer-it lmexzen x « cckimet i tmura n berra », « aṭṭaf n tenɛacin zi berra maḥend ad yegg « ssḍeɛ » i Lmeɣrib ». d yij n umuntif nneɣnit n « ttkerfis x yij n tḥenjirt ».
Nhar-a, Ɛumar d ameḥbus kter zi 6 n iyyuren di ɛukaca.
Yeqqim diha weḥd-s. Ɛemmers wer yemsiger ag imeḥbas nneɣnit. Netta ɛad ittraja di Ɛukaca melmi lmuḥakama-nnes i yellan ɛad wer tbeddi.
Dinni ca n umḥizwar (Competition) tettegg-it jjihet n Normandie di Franṣa. mkul aseggʷas tticcen ij n uwerdi n tlelli i yijjen zi dduniyt. Awerdi‑ya trebḥ‑it di 2019: Greta Thunberg, tameɣnast zi Sswid. Di 2020, Lujayn Al Hatlul tameɣnast ttuɣa d tankruft di Ssaɛud.
Asseggʷas-a, ttuɣa dinni 251 n yewdan i yellan ttemḥizwaren x uwerdi‑ya. Ksin zzag‑sen 3 n yewdan : Agnès Chow (Tajurnalist zi Hong Kong), Suniṭa Alizadeh (Rappura zi Afɣanistan) d ujurnalist Ɛumar Rraḍi.
Amḥizwar x uwerdi n tlelli ɛad wer ikemmel. Maḥend ad ixḍern wen ɣa yrebḥen, zi 15 mars ar 25 abril ad vuṭan (ṣsawṭen) iḥenjiren d tḥenjirin yellan jer 15 d 25 iseggusa zi mara duniyt.
Mara ɣer‑wem jar 15 d 25 n iseggʷusa, tzemmarem ad voṭam ura d kenniw maḥand ad yeksi Ɛumar Rraḍi Awardi n tlelli, i ɣa‑yxedmen tɣawṣa‑nnes (lqaḍiyya) d tjurnalist d tlelli di tmurt n lmeɣrib.
di min yudsen ataf ad tessnem mani d mamek ttvuṭan.

Matoub Lounès ilul deg 24 yennayer 1956, mi yekker uḥeǧaǧu n tegrawla n Lezzayer, deg taddart Tawrirt Musa, ittekkin ɣer Ath Dwala, deg lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu. D amezian, Lounès yesbeggen-ed leḥmala-s i tmurt-is, tutlayt-is d watmaten-is. S tezlitt iṣṣaweḍ-ed iḥulfuyen-is, tayri-s d lebɣi n wul-is : tilelli d tugdut. Lebɣi-nni i tyeṣṣawḍen ɣer nger-is. Deg 1961 yekcem s aɣerbaz, maca ur yufi ara iman-is maḍi. Xas yemma-s teddez abrid n llakul, iselmaden-is zgan ttceyyiɛen-as-id acku ihedder aṭas, 
... (933 chars skipped) ... 
i, asirem d tegmatt, d wigi i d leslaḥ s wayes zemren imaziɣen ad awḍen ɣer lmerɣub-nsen.
«Abrid ireglen
Ad sen-erẓ asalu
Degneɣ win iɛewjen ad t-id nesselhu
Tamurt iɛetben
Ad sen-ekkes azaglu
Amcum y-icekben
Assen ad ten iru»
Matoub d anaẓuṛ d yennan-n ayen yettwali, s tlelli, mebla tugdi. Yebbeḍ ar almi igger irebbi i wseɣti n umezruy. Yebbi-d amennuɣ mgal tikkerkas lak d lbaṭel. Tixazabiyin n imḍebṛen yellan deg udabu degmi tebbi tmurt timunent ifḍeḥiten-t-id. Xas akken ittbedda iɣelli, acku 
... (933 chars skipped) ...
ettabaɛen taddart n Tala Buɛnan. Wid yettgallan s lmut-is ṣawḍen ɣer yeswi-nsen. Lounès uɣalen-t fell-as tmedlin, acku akken d-yenna «Mazal ṣṣewt-iw ad yebbeɛzeq». Iṣeggaden n tmusni, lewḥuc teǧǧa leḥnana d tirrugza, yettqaṛaɛen ad snegren itran deg igenni, ur ɣḍilen ara ṣṣewt n Matoub, winna ara yettezzin deg imeẓẓuɣen-nsen, ad sen-yectiq lehna. Lounès izgel temzi-s, ilul-ed d argaz, yedder d argaz, u yemmut d argaz. Ayen ttxemmimen wiyyaḍ s tsusmi, netta yenna-t-id, mebla tugdi, s leǧher.
T.Z.

Zegga yedwel nnayer d “ass n uzgenfi” i tegga ddewla tameɣrabit, awerni i waṭṭas n iseggusa n weɣnas d uɛebbeẓ zɣer umussu Amaziɣ, ffɣen-d xirebbi n “ibaɣliwen” ḥuma ad wten deg ijjen wass ittegg izza i lebɛaḍ.
Zi lebda, ila tteffɣen-d inni umi wer itteɛjib bu lḥal x mamec ficta-ya tedwel tella mani mma. Uca aṭṭas zzag-sen wer jjin min wer nnin, ina nettaf-iten d Iɛurubiyen, ameknaw Malika Lɛasmi, Tastiqlalit i yetteḥsaben x ixef-nnes d “tazlawit”. Bla ma nettu isalafiyen ameknaw Lkettani d inni
... (918 chars skipped) ... 
aseggʷas Alibi di Libiya uca raḥ x-as amenni. Am ddegg-a n midden ttagin ad neɛmen belli TMAZIƔT, nettat d ddsas min xef munen wegduden n Tmazɣa.
Nitni ɣer-sen nurmal ad ssiwlen x “umaḍal Aɛrab” zi lebḥer ɣer lebḥer, Amaḍal-a nnsen i isekfen kulturat s ccan-nnsent, ilsawen s iẓewran-nnsen, ttexsen ad asen-ssirḍen ajellab n “Aɛrab” s uɣil.
Ina, i d-yeḍharen iseggusa imeggura ssawalen s yisem n “Tameɣrabit”, akunsipt-a ittexsen ad yegg ijjen “tmagit” tettemsex. Minzi bnadem wer izemmer ad yili d “
... (918 chars skipped) ...
ziɣ. Nnayer, ila d ass i zi ssemɣaran s weɣẓaẓ, s min d-ileqḥen deg useggʷas i yeɛdan, d asitem i yimal.
Wah netta d Afellaḥ, minzi Imaziɣen d ifellaḥen, d tarwa n tmurt, zzag-s, ḥessben aseggʷas, ttessnen mani d melmi llan.
Nnayer, ixess-as ad yili d aḥebbi n ttrid min xef i d ɣa munen tawmat di Tmazɣa, ad yili d ass i di ɣa nxarres di mamec awmaten ad kksen leɛdawet-nni jar-asen, ad bnan ijjen tmurt d tmiriwt i merra tarwa-nnes.
Ma inni ikerhen iman-nnsen, itif-asen ad swen zeg waman n lebḥer.

Intro
Sommaire
1 Ɣef wayen yeɛnan win yellan d awal n tudert, i gellan si tazwara : nesla-yas yerna neẓra-t s wallen-nneɣ, nnulent ifassen-nneɣ yerna nerra ddehn-nneɣ ɣuṛ-es.
2 Tudert tban-ed, nwala-ț, nețcehhid fell-as, yerna nețbecciṛ-awen-d tudert n dayem yellan ɣer tama n Sidi Ṛebbi, tura tban-aɣ-ed.
3 Ayen nwala d wayen nesla nxebbeṛ-awen-t-id, iwakken ula d kunwi aț-țekkim di tdukkli-nneɣ, akken nella nukni d Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s, Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
4 Uriɣ-awen ayagi iwakken lfeṛḥ nneɣ ad innekmal.
5 Ayen nesla s ɣuṛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ newwi-yawen-t-id : Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țafat, ur yelli ara deg-s ṭṭlam.
6 Ma neqqaṛ deg webrid n Ṛebbi i nella yili mazal-aɣ nteddu di ṭṭlam, neskaddeb nexḍa i webrid n tideț.
7 Meɛna ma yella nteddu di tafat am akken i gella nețța di tafat, ad ddukklen wulawen-nneɣ, yerna ddnubat-nneɣ ad iriden s idammen n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
8 Ma neqqaṛ ur yelli deg-nneɣ ddnub, atan neskaddeb ɣef yiman-nneɣ, tideț ur telli deg-nneɣ.
9 Meɛna ma nețqiṛṛi s ddnubat-nneɣ i Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța yellan d aḥeqqi, nezmer a nețkel fell-as a ɣ-isameḥ ddnubat-nneɣ, a ɣ-isellek si lbaṭel.
10 Ma neqqaṛ mačči d imednuben i nella, nerra Sidi Ṛebbi d akeddab, awal-is ur yelli ara deg-nneɣ.

Amaray Amatu n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, Mass Si El Hachemi ASSAD, yemlal tanezayt n wass-a lexmis 16 yunyu 2022 akked Uselway n Usqamu Aɣerfan Aɣelnaw, Mass Brahim Boughali. d Timlilit yessuter Umaray amatu iwakken ad yeskasi Akked Uselway n Usqamu Aɣerfan Aɣelnaw d iwamniyen t-iɛemren aṭas n temsal yerzan aladɣa tiseɣlifin n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa, d wussisen ixeddem deg unnar yeddan deg usalu yenǧer uselway n Tegduda yessawalen i tduki taɣelnawt d useǧhed n tirni n daxel.
Ilmend n Temlilit-a daɣen, Mass Si El Hachemi ASSAD yemmeslay-d ɣef telmlilt taxatart n wemni deg uselɣu n tnefrut tamendawant ɣef taramendawt n kra n temyersin deg usaḍuf n uwelleh n usedwel aɣelnaw uṭṭun 04-08 n 23 yennayer 2008, id-mazal, xas ma tamendawt tbeddel seg yimir.

Seg melmi kan, London tessuffeY-d lewkala i lmend n tuṭṭfa n TneYlaft tisṛayilit taqburt n TYawsiwin n beṛṛa, Tzipi Livni, yerna aya ur deg lbaṭel.
Tameṭṭut-a akked sin yemḍebbren isṛayiliyen niḍen, Ehud Olmert ed Ehud Barak, d nitni ay d imḍebbren n unabaḍ (lḥukuma) isṛayili ay yekfan lameṛ yerna ḍefren assenger n yimezdaYen n Γezza ilindi lawan-a.
Livni tella seg yemḍebbren imeqranen deg ṛṛay-a n tmenYiwt n YiYezzawiyen, yerna teqdec d timḍebbert deg usseddu n tnegzart-a (massacre) seg tazwara

f, akken neẓra akk, d ayen ara as-igen ifadden i Isṛayil akken ad ternu ad teg ugar n tenYa (crimes) ay yes ara tessenger Ifalesṭiniyen ed yiYerfan (ccueub) niḍen uḍeifen n Wegmuḍ Alemmas. YuY lḥal, timenYiwt ur nettueaqeb tetteg ifadden i umenYay.
Maca anabaḍ (lḥukuma) abriṭani d adafee ay idufee Yef tikli tanazit n Isṛayil ay yenYan agdud deg Γezza, yerna, Yef wakken d-nnan kra n yisalan, ula d AneYlaf abriṭani n TYawsiwin n beṛṛa, David Milliband, yenna-d lewkala-a n tuṭṭfa n Tzipi Livni “ur

D aya ay aY-ttalasen yigerdan-nni yemmuten deg lbaṭel, wid-nni ay yettwamḥan war ṛṛeḥma s ufus n Yinaziyen n wass-a. S waya ay nezmer ad asen-d-nessiY taYdemt (justice) i nitni ed twaculin-nsen. Nexdee-iten asmi ay llan ddren imi ur nessaweḍ ad ten-nḥudd seg Yinaziyen n wass-a. D acu kan, ur yessekf ad neawed ad ten-nexdee ed ad ten-neḥṛem seg teYdemt aydeg ttalasen, Yas mmuten.

Amagrad aneṣ̣li yeffeY-d deg 16 Dujembeṛ 2009

Aseuɣl n uḍris n tmezgunt "Mouhakama", i d-snekden berra n temzizwert deg teẓrigt tis 12 n tfaska taɣelnawt n umezgun n teḍsa n Mdiya, ‘’yekfa usuɣel-is, ad iqelleɛ useḍrus deg wussan-a, akken ad tɛeddi deg wussan n umezgun n Tmaziɣt, ara d-yeḍrun deg wayyur n yennayer deg Um Lebwagi’’, i d-yenna.
Tamezgunt-a d yiwen n ucqirrew iɣer wwḍen yizeffanen n tekrut, i d-yefkan ttbut s umahil-a n tezmert-nsen ɣas akken d imeɛduren’’, i d-yessegzi Mass Guermi, turart-nsen ‘’tedda akked yizen i yellan deg tmezgunt i d-uraren yizeffanen-a, s yisem i d-yemmalen aya "Mouak, wa lakin" (D ameɛdur, maca).

Wp/shi/Mali
Mali (s tfransist: Mali) s talɣa tazgrart Tagduda n Mali, tga yat tagduda illan ɣ ugafa n tafriqt tzri tjumma nns 1.240.000 km², yiwḍ uṭṭun n imzdaɣ nns uggar n 18 mlyun n ufgan. Tamaẓunt nns tga tiɣrmt n Bamako, illa gis 8 n tmnaḍin, d iwtta nns llan ɣ wammas n tnzruft imqqurn. D iffus n tmurt lliɣ llan kigan n imzdaɣn izri gis wasif n Nijir d asif n Sinigal . Tadamsa n tmazirt tbdd f takrza d tagmrt n yill. Illa ɣ tmazirt n Mali tugt n izurag zund urɣ d yuranyum d tisnt.

Ulac ababat ara d-yini ur sɛiɣ ara ugur n uwelleh i tɣuri akked mmi ameẓyan. Llan kra n warrac ttagin s yimeṭṭi ed tussda tisin ɣer uɣerbaz deg useggas amenzu. Anect yebɣu iban-d dakken leqraya d tiwaculin, maca ula d asegmi (tterbiya) yesɛa azal d agaɛmir ed nnuba tazaɛlukt bac ad yerr tarwa i ubrid. Acku taggara-a, ula d inelmaden iqefzen ḍḥan-d ɛuffen abdar n wawal « taɣuri », ɛyan deg-s ad as-tiniḍ mɣuren yakan yes-s nutni mazal-iten d igerdan. Ɣef waya, asteqsi d wa: acimi ɛuffen warrac taɣ
... (1163 chars skipped) ... 
i tɣuri igerrzen n mmi-s. Acku ma yella-d netta deffir n uɛuffu i iɛuf mmi-s leqraya, dinna d tawaɣit. Seg dduzan n tɣuri, ɣer yiselsa ed tgella (ma ur itett ara deg usečču n uɣerbaz), anelmad ur ilaq akk ad d-yaf tamentilt (sebba) seg tama n yimawlan-is. Akkenni, ɣas ad igerrez wahil, ɣas ad ifaz uselmad daɣen, wanag lebɣi i tɣuri d awezɣi ad d-yeḥnunneḍ i unelmad ma yeẓra belli txus-it tɣawsa, ma yettwali amdakkel-is yesɛa kraḍ n yimruyen netta uhu. Deg wazal n 20 yid-sen, yal yiwen seg wanta tamnaḍt i d-yusa, ḥeḍren yilemẓiyen-a i kraḍ n yiḥuna n usileɣ, akken, tugart tugart, ad sgerrzen aswir-nsen deg usefrek, daɣen ad issinen ad d-ttakken i tddukkla ideg qeddcen ugar n wayen i d-fkan yakan.
... (89 chars skipped) ... 
ɛewwlen ad d-zzin i ṭṭabla n ulmad i lmend n ttiɛad-a. Ɣef tnaga n yiɛeggalen n tddukkla timheggit "Oxy-jeunes", sefraḥent ayendin tikkin n yisegbaren (acteurs) d yimeltaɣen n tddukkliwin deg uḥanu, deg yiwet n tegnit n umbaddal n tektiwin d unecraḥ. Yewwi-d, ad d-nesmekti belli, mi d-muggen dayen kraḍ n yiḥuna-a, yeḍfer-
... (89 chars skipped) ...
ked unemhal n CSP llan dinna gar wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Seld tigawt-a, ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ i iqerben i tddukkla "Oxy-jeunes", ayendin i d-yesnagan s uqeddic igerrzen i d-tessuddes tddukkla-a tilemẓit n Yiderginen. Am wakken llan wid i d-izeɣnen s wudem yelhan, fkan-d rray-nsen i useggem n kra n tlufa i icudden i uheggi s umata. Mi tɛedda tigawt akken ilaq, tesnemmir tddukkla akk ilemẓiyen i d-yerran i tiɣri, merra wid i d-yusan d inebgawen, d wid yekkin deg uheggi d usenɛet n yiḥuna.

Seldazekka n larebɛa, 5 deg waggur-agi n cutember ara d-yili unekcum s aɣerbaz i lmend n useggas aɣurbiz 2018-2018. Yetturaǧu, d imelyan n yinelmaden ara irefden iqerban-nsen i wakken ad uɣalen
... (1727 chars skipped) ... 
n tmurt i useggas-agi aɣurbiz amaynut, i yettwaferqen ɣef 27 351 n yiɣerbazen yellan deg tmurt, ɣer tama n tzeɣwa n usegmi i yettwaheggan ad ilint di ttiɛad, i uqabel n wugur n tačart n tesmilin n tɣuri. Ulamma yennerna s waṭas wuṭṭun n yiɣerbazen, imi deg useggas iɛeddan ala 26 964, maca aseggas-a yella-d ureqqeɛ d tmerna n wazal n 387 n yiɣerbazen imaynuten, ara yellin tiwwura-nsen larebɛa-agi sdat-nneɣ, i d-yefkan leḥsab n 27 351 n yiɣerbazen. ... (1727 chars skipped) ...
deg 48 n lwilayat n tmurt”. D ugur n tačart n tneɣriyin n leqraya s yinelmaden, i d-yettuɣalen yal aseggas. Saɛid Saɛdi, d duktur akk-d aselway n Wegraw i Yedles d Tugdut (RCD), ilul-ed deg 26 ctember 1947 deg taddart n Aɣrib, deg leǧwahi n temdint n ɛzazga. Netta i d-xelqen tuddsa tamezwarut n izerfan n yimdanen deg Ledzayer; anabad n Ledzayer iḥekm-ed fell-as s lḥebs ɣef irmad isertayen-is uqbel n tasellulit n Ledzayer.
1989 Saɛid Saɛdi, mbeɛd tasellulit n wenbad n Ledzayer g 1980 seddaw Benjdid, ixeleq-ed Agraw i Yedles d Tugdut (RCD); akabar asertay i sɛan am aɣawas tadukli n Ledzayer

Tezzi-d tura ddurt neY ahat yiwen n yimalas segmi uYalen yinelmaden Yer uYerbaz. Wiyaḍ i tikkelt tamezwarut ara yawḍen Yer twacult-nsen tis snat.Ɣer leḥsab n yigemmaḍ i d-tefka teYlift n usegmi, ad naf d akken 4 373 222 n yinelmaden deg uYerbaz amenzu, 2 820 172 deg uswir alemmas, 1 222 687 deg tesnawit. Seg twilayt n Ouargla i d-tefka Massa Benghabrit licara n unekcum s wudem unṣib s aYerbaz anda i teḥder i temsirt tamenzut yerzan ttrebegga d uḥareb Yef twennaḍt. Tamsirt-a d tin i d-yettunefken
... (217 chars skipped) ... 
i d-tenjer d wayen yetturajun ad yaweḍ Yur-s uYerbaz azzayri. Aḥric agejdan d win yerzan aswir ilaqen n yinelmaden, win ara d-yasen s lxedma d ubeggen n lebYi. Ɣer tama n waya, Massa Benghabrit, tressa tikli n useggas-a aYurbiz Yef « AYerbaz aYerman amerkid » win ara yefken tagnit i yizzayriyen i merra ad Yren deg uYerbaz anda ara d-awin tamussni d tussna. I useggas-a, am wakken i yetturaju, deg uYerbaz amenzu, ad d-yili umaynut deg wahil yerzan aswir wis kraḍ d wis ukkuz, imi tullsa n tira n wa
... (217 chars skipped) ...
lmaden i tarwa-nsen. Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i aY-d-yewḍen d isallen, deg waṭas n temnaḍin, iYerbazen ur ten-tḥuz ara taluft-a, maca yella wanda i d-yella lixsas, labeɛda deg tudrin ibeɛden. Ulamma tella-d akka temsizzelt deg waggur n Yuct yezrin, mazal kra n yimukan ur ttwaṭṭfen ara. Aya, d ayen ara d-yilin s uɛeggen-nsen seg lejrida n leɛdil. Ma d ayen yerzan adlisfus, am yal aseggas, mazal akka ddeqs n yiYerbazen i yettrajun ad t-n-yawed, ahat d yiwen n uɛewwiq i d-yettuYalen yal tikkelt.
M. Smail

Tura nekni s Yizzayriyen, nesɛa timdukal tijdidin.
Yal yiwet-s ssifa-s maca d tiberkanin i yeqwan. Ttidiren-t yid-neɣ di yal amkan, di yal akud. Am tili ur aɣ-ttaǧǧan-t ara ula dqiqa.
Taṣebḥit mi ara d nekker, s lferḥ ara aɣ-d-qablen-t, ɣef tnac, ad d-inin-t :”S tezmert n yimekli-nwen”.
Tameddit mi ara nesteɛfu, ad steɛfunt yid-neɣ, anda nebɣu nedda, dg usawen neɣ deg ukessar, s nnig neɣ seddaw, myeffus neɣ mzelmed, deg yigenni, neɣ deg lqaɛa… ad ttmuqulen-t ɣur-neɣ, ad ttaḍṣant ɣur-neɣ, tayri-nsen-t tettnerni yal ass, yal ass tettnerni di tuzert akken ad aɣ-ɛeǧben-t. Acku ẓrant nekni s Yizzayriyen nḥemmel tizuranin, ɛecqen-t deg-neɣ acku ẓrant nekni s Yizzayriyen n ffud tayri. Timdukal-nneɣ tijdidin, yal ass ttaẓent ɣer sdat, ṭṭfen-t yakan igran-nneɣ, tiftisin-nneɣ, tibḥirin-nneɣ, iɣeẓran-nneɣ, iberdan-nneɣ…
Tura bɣan-t ugar. Tayri ur tesɛi ara tilisa. Bɣan-t ad ṭṭfen-t ixxamen-nneɣ, ula-wen-nneɣ, tirga-nneɣ, uḍan-nneɣ, ifassen-nneɣ….
Anda akka teddun-t temdukal-agi timaynutin ?
Irgazen akked tlawin n Yizzayriyen di tazwara, ad msaḥmalen, ad uɣalen ad mseɛyun, ad nnaɣen, tagara ad bḍun.
Ma d timdukal-agi timaynutin i d-yennulfan iseggasen-agi ineggura gullent ad idiren-t yid-neɣ i lebda, alamma iferqaɣ lmut.
Sghur Hemmar Bussaed

ZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Iḍelli, ass n usiḍyas, ay d-ffɣen yigmaḍ n tɣemlilt n Yunyu 2022 yernu d tin ayɣef d-nnan d « amures asurfan » aydeg anagraw asegman yeqqel-d ɣer wakken yennum itteddu zik, deffir kra n yiseggasen aydeg ttwaddmen wakaten i ulesses n unfafad bu tedri, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked uneɣlaf n usegmi aɣelnaw, Abdelhakim Belabed.
ZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Aneɣlaf n Usegmi aɣelnaw, Abdelhakim Belabed, yenna-d ass n usiḍyas (ssebt) deg Zzayer tamaneɣ, dakken asmal n umḍiq n tusnakin deg kraḍ n yiswiren n uselmed yessefk akken ad nemmezg akked tneflit tasnatwilant yellan deg Umaḍal.

Amedyaz zi teqbilt ɣer tenniḍen
Lḥal n umedyaz imsebḍa zi teqbilt ɣer tenniḍen. Kul icten d mamek tettmsurruf aked imedyazen-nnes. Azgen ameqqran n imedyazen ittili ɣer-sen ledcur-nnsen mani zeddɣen. Ttilin d lwacunat. Lux, wer qqimen amenni zeg wami ibeddel wegdud n Arrif, dewlen d imenneɛraq la nitni, xeddmen di berra. Wer qqimen tetten aleqquz n weɣrum s ẓẓamar. Manaya ixes ad yini belli ijjen wagla d a
... (1865 chars skipped) ...
-sseɣren. Maca qa d amedyaz i daneɣ-issiwlen x Ddhar n ubarran, issiwel-aneɣ x Yiɣzar n Wuccen. D ijjen uterras islemd-aneɣ amezruy-nneɣ x webrid n yizlan. D ijjen iḥeṭṭa tanettit-nneɣ, netta d tisit i di nxezzer ixef-nneɣ s mayen dag-s yecna, niɣ iɛuffen. Maca neccin nettɛeyyeb tisit, nettu ila lɛib dag-neɣ ig illa.
Tuɣa neqqar ila amedyaz n ddcar wer isfurruj. D ijjen marka n useɛqar i nettegg i mayen illan-nneɣ. Maca qa d ta d lweqt mani amedyaz-nneɣ ad as-negg ccenɛet-nnes, a daneɣ-isfurrej.

Iferzizwi
Iferzizwi neɣ Ifferr n tzizwit (Assaɣ ussnan: Melissa officinalis) d talmest n yimɣi asaɣur imezgi yeṭṭafaren tawsit n iferzizwi deg twacult n temsefranin. Talmest-a tettemɣay-d s talɣa tagamant deg tamiwin yezzin i yilel agrakal.
Aglam[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Ageṭṭum (tadra) n uferzizwi iga d akuẓdis. ijeǧǧigen-is d imellalen neɣ d izilluyen deg tikwal niden. Yal agummu deg-s ittaddam 4 n yifsan, ma tiddi-ines tettili gar n 70 alamma d 150 cm. Tikdi-ines d tin yemmugen am yismim akken daɣen i tudes ɣer tmersa.
Deg taggara n unebdu ttufraren-tt-d tjeǧǧigin ččuren-tt d amɣus ayen yettaǧǧan tizizwa ad trusent ɣef yimɣi ayi s tuget, dɣa s yagi i d-yusa yisem-is uddis iferr + tizizwit.

Tuḥdiqt tessuter seg Aemer ad as-d-yawi taxeddamt ara ixedmen fell-as. Aemer inuda, yufa tin iwumi qqaren Badriya. Badriya ur txulef ara Tuḥdiqt, tella qessiḥet aṭṭas. Saɛid ZIzawi, ijjen zeg imeffɣen n tseddawit aseggas n 96, d ijjen wudem n tɣensa d ubeddi x uḍar d wenhezzi g umussu amaziɣ. Zeg yinni i yessersen ddsas n tmesmunt n Buya di Benṭeyyeb , amen yeksi deg uḍar deg waṭṭas n isuraf n umussu amaziɣ, am tyemmunt n Qaḍi Qeddur…
Deg yijjen wemsawal-nnes aked Nadorcity, yesserɣ Saɛid Zizawi tifawin x mamek temsar alami yeqqim 8 n iseggusa netta ixeddem bla ma a t-xellsen. Di 2011, zegga i tekker lɣuɣet n wegdud, tudef tmesmunt n yinni i ɣer llan

in nneɣni i ttuɣa yellan di Driwec d Miḍar d Nnaḍur… Yeqqar Zizawi, belli yusa-dd wemsawal, kksen akid-neɣ awal bac a nadef di lxedmet. ḍḍwasa n imeɣnasen n Miḍar d Driwec dewlen-dd zi Rbaṭ, maca ḍḍusi-inu walu. Arayes yusa-s-dd warḍi zi ssulṭa bac ad ɛemmren imukan yexwan. Yetter zeg-neɣ a nraḥ a nexdem. Nkumasa di cher n yennayer 2012. Zi ssenni neqqim nxeddem, nettraja.  n Benṭeyyeb , maca walu. Iruḥ al Arbaṭ, umi ɣa yesseqsa x ddusi-nnes, ṭṭfen x uzellif. Yeɛqeb-dd ssenni, yedɛa-ten di lmeḥkama di Wejda. ɣer umezwaru wcin-as lḥeqq, di listinaf wtin-as kulci di ẓiru.

Min Ya tggeḍ maṛa tufiḍ čan umxumbeṛ?
- aṭ-qaḍ-ač raja čwayt ṭaṛabut ad tiṛi ṭezr-a amxumber ad u ad tiṛi txeddem x'as. Mintṛa ček txezz-ad ṭswaṭ nni n'uɛdaṛ, itsemma qa ɛad xedmen x umxumbeṛ nni. * ɛṭud Ya #wikimedia-tech channel Deg Freenode:
- Maṛa Yak rehṣab di IRC , aḍef ḍanita : #wikimedia-tech.
- Maṛa lla, Xza da IRC help page niY Freenode's webchat platform.
- Mara tufid čan umxumber awarn i ami tweddar tsswaṭ nni n uɛdaṛ, inaneYt deg IRC, adef Yas ssa this page's talk page niY da bug tracker (direct link).
- Mara ur tssinḍ at xedmed di IRC, wen danY iɛdren imxumbaṛ, niY di Meta-Wiki, aṛzu ṭwiza zeg imeddukal nneč deg igṛawn n awar seg iṛes neč.

Ihi amek wakken i t-id-nenna deg uṭṭun n ddurt yezrin, lecyax i d-ṣṣuben s abrid ussan-nni ieedan ṭṭfen deg wawal-nsen anda i d-nnan ma seuẓẓgen yimḍebbren-agi nneY Yef wayen akka nessutur ad nuYal Yer uneḥbus n lxedma ; Elaḥsab n yimḍebbren s sin n sandikat-agi azal 95% n yiselmaden d yixeddamen s umata i iḥebsen axeddim deg yiYerbazen ass n 1 akked 2 di fuṛar imi imḍebbren ur d-rrin ara Yef tiYri-nsen. « Zyada Yef uneḥbus-agi n lxedma s usnerni n wussan, meḥsub 2,3,4 ara d-yettilin yal ddurt, lecyax ur tteemmiren ara akk ayen icudden Yer tebdelt (l’administration).» i aY-d-yenna Mass Rezgui yiwen gar yimḍebbren n UNPEF
I usmekti, ixeddam-a ṭṭalaben : asemsawi n liḥala-nsen deg wayen yeenan tadrimt, tiddin n lecYal akken iwata deg uxxam n tenmehla, tukksa n tneḥyaft, asizdeg n yikayaḍen…atg
Isallen i aY-d-yewwḍen, qqaren-d dakken anemhal n ttrebga n Tizi Wezzu yessawel-d kan i CNAPEST iwakken ad yemmeslay yid-sen, dYa lecYal-a dayen yesserfan sandika-nni-nniḍen. « Nerfa Yef unemhal imi ur aY-d-yessawel ara, acu kan nerfa kter Yef CNAPEST imi qeblen ad ruḥen weḥd-sen Yur-s mebla ma nedda » ikemmel yenna Mass Rezgui.
Akken yebYu yili, ilaq Yef yixsimen-a ad d-afen tifrat acku simmal tteeddin wussan, simmal yettfat lḥal.
Lhocine Ourezki

Mi d-yettwaɛreḍ ɣer uɣmis n tliẓrit n tis 8:00 n tmeddit deg tliẓrit tanagdudt, yenna-d Mass Beldjoud dakken timurɣiyin-a nɣant 24 n yimdanen deg twilayt n Ṭṭaref d sin niḍen deg twilayt n Sḍif.
Timurɣiyin-a sxeṣrent 1800 n yiqeṭṭaren n ufersun d wazal n 800 n yiqeṭṭaren n tẓegwa dge Ṭṭaref, Sḍif, Suq Ahṛas, Ǧiǧel, Skikda d Tipaza, ɣef wakken ay d-yerna.
Ɣef leḥsab n uneɣlaf n ugensu, tagnit tanezwant ay d-yellan deg mennaw n twilayin n ugmuḍ (azɣal d waḍu) d ayen ay d-yellan d ssebba deg tmurɣiyin-a, yernu yenced-d iɣermanen akken ad ḥadren ugar, ladɣa deg wayyur-a.
Ixebber-d daɣ dakken « timurɣiyin ay d-yellan deg Suq Ahṛas ttwasseɣsint », am wakken ay srewlen 350 n twaculin deg twilayt-a.

Umi yeɛda tlata n iseggusa x raxaret Ɛimad Lɛattabi, Irifyen n Uruppa ggin tnayen n wufuɣen sseḥḍaren-dd dag-sen buḥbel n Ɛimad, ig yemmuten ass n 20 yulyu 2017, s tqarṭast deg uzellif, wami x-as ikka ca n wussan di spiṭar uca yemmut.
Abeddi amezwaru yexreq deg Umsterdam di Tmura yudaren (Hulanda), mani ffɣen imeɣnas n tmesmunt umi qqaren (NAR) d tamunt umi qqaren (Tagrawt n Irifyen n Uruppa).
Deg ubeddi n Umsterdam, wcin awar s yisem n tmesmunin-a tina, tuɣa dinni ijjen usemɣar zi Ɛimad s nnewwac ɣar tewlaft-nnes, amen dinni sinyan yinni yeḥḍaren deg ijjen ddeftar n wureɣ amec i das-semman.
Abeddi-a mani isɣuyyen ila Ɛimad yettwaneɣ war yelli yemmut waha, mamec yerni amɣar n NAR yenna balli ccahed x tgazzart n Ɛimad s tqarṭast ass-nni, wcin-as 10 n iseggusa deg webniq, d aḥudri-nni umi qqaren Ɛebdlḥeq Lfaḥsi netta zi Benṭayyeb.
Abeddi wis tnayen ixreq di temdint n Antwerpen di tmurt n Biljik, abeddi- ya tegg-itt tenni umi qqaren tamezdayt n ḥirak. Abeddi-ya usin-dd ɣer-s aṭṭas n imeɣnas n lḥirak n Arrif ig i ittɛicen di Tmura n Uruppa.
Ufuɣ-a wanita i di tuɣa wcin awar tamezdayt n lḥirak di tmurt n Biljik, mani isɣuyyen s yiseml n Ɛimad Lɛettabi belli yammut s tqarṭast wadji yemmut waha amen yettwanna zi jjihet n ddewla n Lmuɣrib di tsaɛɛet-nni.

Le Notre Père et l’Ave Maria, ainsi que les prières du dimanche de la Communion Mère Qabel:
1 AbabatneY 2 Azal fellam Meryemma
1 Ababat-nneY
Ababat-nneY yellan deg ‘genwan
ad ittwaqeddes yisem-ik
tas ed tgeldit-ik.
Ad ittwaxdem lirad-ik di ddunit am deg ‘genni.
Fkan-aY ed ass-agi aYrum nneY b-wass.
Ssurf-aneY iYilifen nneY akken netsemmiḥ
ula d nekwni i wid i-Y-iḍelmen.
Deg wejaṛṛeb ur Y-ttağğa ‘ra an-cceḍ
Meana kkes-aneY ed seg wayen n-dir.
Ababat-nney yellan deg ‘genwan,
d Kečč ay d-tafat nneY, mel aY abrid n Mmi-k.
D Kečč ay d Ṛṛuḥ nneY, ur Y-ttağğa ‘ra.
D Kečč ay d Babat-nneY, ssiqbel aY Meryemma d yemmat-nneY,
akken an-ili d atmaten an-qabel eedaw yid-es,
eedaw ik ay d eedaw nneY,
an-zdi kan yid-ek
anda d ak yehwa, melmi d ak yehwa, akken i d ak yehwa.
Aman numen.
2 Azal fellam
Azal fellam a Meryamma
sser dgem ifaḍ
Ssid yidem yella.
Tettunemmreḍ ger tilawin irkwelli,
d Yasue*, tarwa n teebbuṭ-im ittunemmer.
A Meryamma taqeddist, a tayemmatt n-Ṛebbi,
tuttra yinem fellaneY
s imednuben s imeYban,
tura d wass n lmut nneY.
A Meryemma ḥebbu yemma, ili yaneY d yemma-tneY
akken an-ili seg warraw im, an-ili d atmaten n Mmi-m
an-ddu yid-es an-zdi.
A Meryemma ḥebbu yemma, ili yaneY d yemma-tneY
an-ddari tacḍaṭ im, an-qabel eedaw yid-em.
Ṛebbi yezṛa acu yuYen, yezṛa acu i-Y iwulmen,
tter it fellaneY!
Aman numen.
*neY Aysa

Imezwura-nneɣ ǧǧan-aɣ-d tamurt yelhan, tutlayt, tugdut akkd waṭas n tlufa nniḍen. Maca ur ɣ-d ǧǧin ara awanek ireṣṣan iḍaren-is di tmurt-nneɣ. Ur d-nufi ara anabaḍ, tawuri-ines tettili s tutlayt-nneɣ tayemmat Tamaziɣt-Tazwawt. Annect-a ikref-aɣ ifadden, nezga neqqim d igujilen gar iɣerfan n umaḍal.
Tags: azarug
Aṭas n tmura umaḍal issaramen ar awḍent ar iswi amuqran, ar win icefâen, issidiren iYerfan d tYermiwin nsen. Kra nnant tt id âinani war tufra kra nniḍen uqment cwiṭ tufra, am akken ssegrant taqejjirt.
Tikli vYunt ddunt as tmura, iswi d azarug, d timmunent, d tilelli. UlayYer asqecmaâ ulayYer asmejger.

Xamarin
Xamarin (Anṭaq s tegnizit: Zamarin) d ccarika spécialisée deg software, tettwaxleq g 2011 u tuɣ-itt Microsoft g 2016.
S langage n C#, mkull développeur yezmer ad yaru application tezmer ad teddu g Windows, Android neɣ iOS.
Amezruy[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Deg 1999, Miguel de Icaza akk d Nat Friedman xelqen ccarika Ximian, ssenzen les application i iteddun deg GNOME (Linux).
Mi d-yeffeɣ C# akk d .Net, Icaza d Friedman xemmemen af protaj ar Linux. Version tamezwarut teffeɣ-d g 2001 u semman-tt Mono.
Ximian tɛedda ar ifassen n Novell g 2003 umbeɛd ar ifassen n Attachmate g 2011. Attachmate tessufeɣ aṭas n les développeurs i yellan deg usenfar n Mono.
G 2011, Icaza d Friedman xelqen ccarkia tajdidt : Xamarin, aṭas n les développeurs usan-d seg tarbaɛt n Mono.

Tigemmi Tamellalt
Tigmmi Tamellalt Iɣrem d ameqqran akw di tmurt n Umerruk, tili deg yiwen arky (3.269.962 h). D iɣrem d ameqqran akk deg tmazɣa akwd Ledzayer Tamanaɣt.
S wassaɣ yaḍnin ar nttini Casablanca s tafransist d tulayin tiyaḍ, neɣ الدار البيضاء s tutlayt n taerabt.

Imrezzuten ggin ij n lista n ca n tmegga, i izemmarn ad sneqsent zi tewsar, zemmarent ad smeẓyent rrimet al setta n iseggusa. Timegga-ya, sleqqant la x waṭṭas n waṭṭanen iɛeffanen.
“Wer ittiwi bu lxedmet aṭṭas, maḥend a nedder aṭṭas.“ Ammu ttwalan ca n imussnawen d Imarikaniyyen. Mala neḍfer min umi ggin “Life’s Essential 8“ manaya tefser-it di tmesmunt tamarikant n wul.
Timeslayin-a ad sselqant zi lehlakat n wul, d waṭansyu, d waṭṭas n lehlakat nniḍen d iɛeffanen. Wi ɣa yeggen “8 n ipilaren n tudert“ min zi ten-t ataf wer ittewsar deɣya!
Timegga-ya ttwalan imrezzuten-a, belli sneqqasent di lmizan, shekkʷant ssekkʷar, ɛeddlent kulistirul d waṭansyu. Amen ttwalan belli iḍes mliḥ, d macca tasebḥant, anhezzi d tikkest x ugirru, rennint di leɛmar,
Di trezzut i ggin, sseɛdan i 6500 n yewdan, ɣer-s di jjwayeh n 47 n iseggusa, iwdan-a marra, inni yeddren mliḥ, ɣer yella waṭansyu d ssekkʷar mliḥ, wer kemmin, tetten macca tesbeḥ, ufin rrimet-nsen d ṭameẓẓyant s 6 snin x yenneɣni.
Inni ɣer ttuɣa 41 n iseggusa, ufin ɣer-sen 36 n iseggusa di lesnin abyuluj (biological). Inni ila ihelken zeg wul, d ufin rrimet-nsen tujer lesnin-nsen. Ayet 53, ufin-ten ɣer-sen 57 di lesnin abyuluj.
D tina d tmenya n tmeslayin i zi tettwessa tmesmunt atamarikant n wul
- Ecc macca d tasebḥant
- Nhezz, tegged Spurt
- Sbedd girru
- Ṭṭes mliḥ
- Ejj Lmizan di lqanun
- Err taynit i ukulistirul
- Err taynit i waṭansyu
- Err taynit i sekkʷar

Ḥmed Ɛeyyad, isem-is unaẓur Rwiced, d yiwen unaẓur aɣerfan aqbayli n ccraḥa, umezgun, issura, akk d Ssinima. Ilul di 20 yebrir 1921 di Lezzayer Tamanaɣt. Yemmut ass n 28 yennayer 1999. Imawlan-is laṣel-nsen seg Aẓeffun, di Tamurt n leqbayel.
Yekcem ar uɣerbaz amezwaru di 'Susṭara', di 'Kasba tunigt', ur iɛeṭṭel ara yeḥbes leqraya-s iwakken ad yawen imawlan-is i llan xuṣṣen nezzeh di teswiɛt nni udabu ifransisen, uqbel trad umadal wis II. Ixdem aṭas lecxal: ayeznuzu iɣmisen, ay ṣefeḍ isebaden, ay
... (477 chars skipped) ... 
rabt n Lezzayer Rwiced. Qqaren d tanaẓurt n tiliẓri Nuriya, i s-yefkan isem agi n taẓuri-ines. S isem-is yeqqim armi d tamettant-is.
Timlilit n sin unaẓuren Aḥmed Ayad d Racid Qsenṭini, d tazwara umecwar ɣezifen n Rwiced, i ikecmen di yal aḥric n taẓuri: ccna, amazgun, tiliẓri, ssinima, atg. Yekcem isyin deg waṭas n temtilin (rôles), di 'les sketch', wala d tcequfin umezgun, ama s tutlayt taqbaylit, n lejdud-is, neɣ s tutlayt taɛrabt n Lezzayer, is i d-ittureba. Isegwasen ar zdat, yuɣal ikecem s
... (477 chars skipped) ...
ni, Nuriya, Keltum, Farida Sabunǧi, Yasmina, Larbi Zekkal, Muḥamed Unic, Sid Aḥmed Agumi, atg. Daɣen Aḥmed Ayad yella yetteka di tarbaɛt umezgun n Rrayu n teqbaylit, zdat n Ali Abdun, Muḥamed d Saɛid Ḥilmi, Qadri Ṣɣeyer, Ccix Nurdin, Samira, atg. Di tagar isegwasen n 50, netta d Muḥamed d Saɛid Ḥilmi, xedmen di Rradyu n teqbaylit yiwet n tedwilt n necraḥa d teḍṣa, isem-is Tlata izehwaniyen.
Daɣen Aḥmed Ayad icna aṭas n tuɣac ama s teqbaylit, neɣ s taɛrabt n Lezzayer, ladɣa tid n taḍṣa d necraḥa.

Tutlayt tapuṛtugit (s tapuṛtugit : língua portuguesa neɣ português), yiwet n tutlayin tilatinin i ttmeslayen s waṭas deg Portugal ed deg Brazil[2], d tutlayt tis sin deg umaḍal deffir taspenyult deg amḍan n i wid yettmeslayen-is, tuget-nsen zedɣen deg Brazil (187 000 000 n meden deg tazwara n lqern wis 21). Llan daɣen igduden wi i yetmeslayen tapuṛtugit deg Tafrikt (ahat n 8 000 000 n meden deg Angola, Iɣef Azegzaw, Ginya Tasebgast, Ginya-Bissau, Muzambiq ed Sao Tomé ed Principe)[3].

Deg wass n 25 yunyu zeg useggʷas n 2019, ffɣen aberru n idzayriyen deg waṭṭas n tmeskanin, kessin bandu n umaziɣ, zeɛma d aḥami x ubandu-ya Amaziɣ. Maca manaya yejja aṭṭas zzag-sen ad syuran di tkumisariyin. Maca qa krisis-a n ubandu, wer yelli ca di Dzayer waha, yella di Lmuɣrib d Mawritanya ɛawed.
Bandu n Umaziɣ di Dzayer.
Qqaren ca n imeɣnas d imaziɣen belli bandu Amaziɣ maci d ijjen ḥajet nettekk x-as aked min ittemsaren di Dzayer deg wussan-a, maca qa netta yeqqen ɣer tmagit n tussna, immal
... (995 chars skipped) ... 
t ila Imaziɣen di Arrif xsen ad bḍan x Lmuɣrib, ad ggen tagduda n Arrif.
Ttuɣa Mulay Muḥend yegga yegga tagduda n Arrif deg useggʷas n 1921 deg yeẓẓelmeḍ n Lmuɣrib, issers-as ijjen ubandu imsebḍa x wenni n lmexzen, wami ila ibedd deg wudem n uḥewwes Aspanyu d ufransis, maca tagduda-ya wer teddir mɣar xemsa n iseggusa.
Lḥusma d Nnaḍur zi tneddam timeqqranin n tegduda-ya i yettwassnen ass-a s “Arrif ameɣrabi”.
Bdant timejra n unhezzi n Arrif di 28 Kṭuber 2016, lami nɣin ijjen bu iselman umi qqaren
... (995 chars skipped) ...
ri n wureɣ ismeɛnan x sseḥra.
Zegga yeɛda azgen n lqern, deg useggʷas n 2017, yenna unessixef i yeɛdan, Muḥemmed Weld Ɛabdelɛaziz, ad yeɛdel bandu, xmi i ɣa yerni tnayen n icerriḍen d izeggʷaɣen, s wadday d sennej, maḥend ad yessiwel zeɛma x “ixafuren i yemmuren d inni i ɣa yemmten d nitni ccaten acbar x tmurt-nnsen deg yimal”.
Yenna Weld Ɛabdelɛaziz deg wakud-ines: “aqqa wami nerni tnayen-nni n icerriḍen izeggʷaɣen ɣer ubandu, zzag-s i ɣa yessen umuritani min ixes ad yini ubandu-nnes.
Tala: BBC

Thegga-d, ussan iɛeddan, tddukkla tadelsant Taflest, deg Tizi Uzzu, taẓrigt tamezwarut n tmedyazt timezdit s uḥḍar n kra n umḍan n yimedyazen, imi yella yerza ɛaruḍ kra n wid iwumi tehwa tekti. Dɣa, deg lqidar n yiwen n wass kan, ɛeddan-d kra n yimedyazen i d-yewwin isefra akken lwaḥid, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-tenna tselwayt n tddukkla-a tilemẓit i d-iheggan ttiɛad, Massa Fahima Seddiri. Ɣur kra n yimedyazen, tiwin n yisefra imezdiyen yettak-d i uzayez tamuɣli-nniḍen ɣef uḥulfu d yizen n usefru, imi yal amedyaz s tektiwin-is, s tmenna-s, s taɣect-is, atg. « Tgerrez dayen kan teẓrigt-a tamezwarut, ɣas xussen wallalen ». I d-tenna tselwayt n tddukkla timheggit. Send ad d-ternu, ad d-temmeslay ɣef yiswi n tfaska-a: « Nebɣa s tfaska-a n tmedyazt timezdit tamaynut, ad d-nesnulfu tafaska s wudem-nniḍen. Walaɣ taggara-a imedyazen, wa ijebbed akka, wa akkin. Nniɣ-as yelha ad ten-nezdi, imi asefru imezdi ad t-id-awin ugar n sin n yimedyazen. Ula d arraz n temlilit, ad yili daɣen d imezdi ». S teẓrigt-a tamezwarut, ssaramen yimheggiyen ad yili yenǧer ubrid i teẓrigin-nniḍen, akken ad wennɛent ugar tegnatin, ad temɣur daɣen tfaska. Ɣef tnaga n yiwen n yimekki, akken yebɣu yili, d ayen yelhan wayen i d-tefka teẓrigt-a tamenzut, abeɛda imi wwḍen iswi n uzday.
M. K.

Ccwal mazal ar tura yettkemmil ger imezdaɣ n Semɛun akked iǧadarmiyen ass-a n lḥed 16 ṭuber.
Sebba n wayagi d iǧadarmiyen i iḥebsen abrid ɣef imezdaɣ. Tasebḥit n wass-a imezdaɣ n Yiẓnagen belɛen abrid n lwilaya yettawin ɣer Bgayet akked Semɛun. Imezdaɣ-ayi ran ad d-seknen lɣiḍ-nnsen mgal timerna di ssuma n itikiyen n ttawilat uṣiweḍ. Syin akin d iǧadarmiyen n tɣiwant n Semɛun i d-igren iman-nnsen ad s wexṛen imesbaniyen. Ayagi isnerna d i zzɛaf n imesbaniyen i d-yeglan s ccwal ger iǧadarmiyen akked imesbaniyen-agi. Iǧadarmiyen wwten-d s lbumbat n lakrimujan.
C.W

Deg wawal-nnes deg tɣimit tačuṛant ay d-yellan i udɣar ɣef usenfar n usaḍuf assmadan n tedrimt, yeckeṛ-d Mass Chenine « akk imazanen ay yettekkan deg usbuɣer n uskasi n usenfar n usaḍuf-a.
I lmend n waya, iwekked-d Mass Chenine ɣef ubdad n yimazanen ɣer yidis n uɣref azzayri d tmenḍawt, ladɣa amagrad-nnes wis 139 ay d-yennan dakken s kra n usaḍuf ara yesneqsen tiɣbula tinagdudin neɣ ad tent-yernu ur yettwaqbal ara ala ma ddan-d deg-s wakaten ara iḍemnen timerniwt n tnudaf n uwanak neɣ akaten ara yeǧǧen tamurt ad tcuḥḥ i yidrimen deg yinsaten niḍen n uṣerref anagdud.
Seg yidis niḍen, Mass Chenine yeckeṛ-d tamsetlelt n yimazanen deg tririt mgal unfafad bu uqacuc d umahil-nsen deg unrar deg Lezzayer talqayant d tallalt tadrimant ay fkan i Yizzayriyen.
Agraw Aɣerfan Aɣelnaw yessefk ad yeqqim d tasudut tamenḍawant yessmaden amahil n unabaḍ i lmend n tmeṣkiwt n Lezzayer tamaynut, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna.

Ivy League
Ivy League d tagrawt n 8 seg tesdawiyin timeqranin akk n ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n Yiwunak Yeddukklen. Ti d tisdawiyin n Brown, Columbia, Cornell, Dartmouth, Harvard, Princeton, Pennsylvania akked Yale. Tisdawiyin-a mechuṛit s weswir-nsent aɛlayan yerna amur ameqran seg wid ay yeqqaren deg-sent d arraw n yimeṛkantiyen imeqranen.
Ayɣer qqaren-iten Ivy League[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tagrawt-a n Ivy League d nettat ay d-yelhan s usseddu n temsizzliyin n waddal ay ttgen yinelmaden n tesdawiyin-a (ama d irgazen, ama d tisednan). Tagrawt-a tennulfa-d deg 1954.

Kra n tnmmalin f tewllaft tamzwarut igan tiddt i ukbay asggan: Tawllaft ad tga tin ukbay asggan (M87*) ɣɣʷalli itẓṛṛam ɣ twllaft ad. Iga ukbay asggan (M87*) yan ukbay asggan iṭṭafn yat taẓḍuyt tabrarayt ɣ wul n umahllaw (M87) inn yaggugn f umtiweg n wakal s 55 n ugndid n usggʷas n tifawt, d taẓḍuyt n (M87*) ar tlkkm ar 6,5 mlyar n tkklit taẓḍuyt n tefukt . Ufan imassann tiwllafin ad lliɣ smun tinmmalin d ismmaln zzɣ: 8 itiliskupen iskkimn inbaḍn ɣ kigan n tasguiwin n wakal afad ad teswwuri zund iɣ gan yan, d afad ad smunn ku ismmaln ɣ uɣawas n (Event Horizon Telescope) iɣ illa wammas nns ɣ usfaylu n uiffus s yat tawwuri tasinrat gr tasnurayt n usayrur n Mirikan (NASA) d tasnurayt n usayrur n Urupa (ESA). Tekka tizi n usuɣd n ismmaln ad d tewllafin afad ad afen tawllaft ad tamggarut ma yelkkmen ar kṛaḍ isggʷasn s twwuri tamqqrant zzɣ tarabbut iswwurin g usnfar . D a wer nttu mas-d amassan 《Albiret Inctayn》ad igan amzwaru isnmaln mas llan t tifggatin tixatarin g umaɣrad iṭṭafn tinnuzɣa idusn tẓḍar ad tessɣʷli nɣd ad tessumm ula tifawt ngum n 103 n usggʷas f ɣilad, d umzwaru mad isnmaln mas tlla tamnaḍt issfawn issutln i yikbayn isggann iga-t umassan 《 Stiven Huking 》. ( d mayad a neẓṛṛa g ugaraw n teẓaṛayt tasggant d ssaɣn as addaw n uzmzzu ).

Ufan lǧessa-s daxel n ugelmim n waman
Chebini Cherif, ur d-nban ara 24 n wussan, ufan lǧessa-s sin yilmeẓyen n taddart-is (Saḥel, di tYiwant n Wizgan) deg ugelmim deg umenzu n mayyu. akken kan yeffeɣ lexbar, wweḍen srabes n usellek s amkan, af-n lǧessa n Chebini texṣar. Di sbiṭar n Tizi wezzu, nudan ɣef sseba n tmettant-a.
ad d-ner lwelha belli Chebini Cherif yessaweḍ di lɛemer-is 34 n yiseggasen. Ad d-nesmekti daɣen belli seg asmi yeffeɣ lexbar n uɛerreq-is (iḍ n 6 di yebrir) kkren imezdaɣ n taddart-is ttnadin fell-as.

Yugurten SegniSegni Yugurten iwwi araz amenzu deg tfaska i tga tdukla ITRI ADELSAN N WEQBU. Ḥmed Ǧennadi n BRTV isseqsa Yugurten ɣef uḥulfu ines tura imi i s d-iṣaḥ waraz amenzu. Inna umedyaz: d-tidett aḥulfu amenzu d-tumert(d lfeṛḥ), maca inna-d diɣen dakken terna-d taẓayt ɣef uzagur ines, imi ass-a, issefk fell-as, ad-yaẓ ar zdat… tuɣalin ar deffir ur telli, akken s d-irna Ḥmed Ǧennadi. Ifuk-d awal-is Yugurten s wawal nni n Ṭaher Ǧaɛuṭ, tella twacult ittaẓen, tella twacult ittnegrayen, a wi’ yufan a-nili seg twacult nni ittaẓen.

Timahilin
-
D arurad, ad tiniged akken iwata
Ala Firefox i k-yettmuddun ddeqs n tarrayin akken ad tinigeḍ s urured. Mudd udem iyiɣewwaṛen n yiminig-ik akken ad tinigeḍ s wugar n urured s iɣewwaṛen imezwer am beṭṭu uḥric anadi udmawan.
-
Izegrar d ayla-k
Seg usewḥel n udellel ar usider n tvidyutin, Firefox ak-yeǧ ad tferneḍ ifecka n tunigin ifazen. Rnu izegrar i k-ilaqen, kkes wiyaḍ.
-
Ili-k d aqeṛṛu n tbaḍnit-ik
Numen d akken isefka-ik d ayla-k. Firefox ur yeznuzu ara anekcum ar umazray-ik n tunigin, ihi d kečč i d aqeṛṛu s ifecka am tunigin tusligt s ummesten mgal aḍfar.
Ugar n tlelli
Ur nelli ara seg wid yeṭṭafaṛen taqḍiɛt. Terna-t Mozilla, tuddsa ur yattnadin ara tadrimt, Firefox yewwi amennuɣ ɣef izerfan umḍinen udiɣ yettḥarab ɣef tikti n Internet i yal yiwen — mačči kan i kra.

Buncuceṭ
Buncuceṭ (Assaɣ ussnan: Macroscelidea) d tafesna taɣersawt taynanawt meẓẓiyen, tettwasgenses-d s yiwet n twacult igebren seg 4 n tewsitin d n telmas timiddurin.
Aglam[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Ibuncucṭen d wid ilan (isɛan) axenfuc ɣezzifen, d wallen d imeẓẓaɣ meqqren, akken i llant kra n telmas ilan ini n wazzar d aymam. Ableɣ n telmas-is iga gar n uɣerda alamma d ugbur. Akken i ttwassezgin i wakken ad nettgen acku iṭarren-nsen n deffir ugaren wid n zdat. Ttidiren s tuget deg Tferka s anẓul n tneẓruft
Učči[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Yettunag ɣef wučči-ines deg yiṭ, anda itett ibureɣsen, maca llant telmas i tetten imɣan.
Asesmel[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]

Ma nuɣal-d ciṭuḥ s amezruy n yisem AFROZAF, ad naf d akken d isem n yiwet n terbaɛt n ccna n tezlit taqbaylit i d-ilulen deg useggas n 2007, di taddart n Agarsafen, taddart i d-yezgan deg umalu n teẓgi n Ukeffadu, di tɣiwant n At Yeǧǧaṛ, deg usamar n Tizi Uzzu. Dawed
Dawed d agellid wis sin n tgelda n Israyil tamzikit, yuder deg uwines wis mraw send talalit n Ɛisa. Deg ajjed n tineslemt, d nnbi seg 25 inbiyen yuran di Leqran.
Tudert-is[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
D ameksa n udrum n Yahuda, d mmis amaẓuz n Yasa , Ḍalut agellid n imir nni yusem fellas acku yebɣa ad as yekkes tagelda mi i yenɣa Ǧalut ameqran. Asmi yemmut Ḍalut yuɣal Dawed d agellid yeẓaz tilisa n tgelda n israyil alama d Maṣer akked Furat imi yemmut dawed ixelf t id Sliman mmis ɣef uqerru n tgelda.

dreɛ i ittwaggen s thiḍurt n leenzi xmmi tetteffeɣ deg umquṭṭes (ad tegg lḥeb) », yeqqar eawed « timɣarin timaziɣin n libya ttuɣa tteksent cear i thidurt n leenzi yirḍen‑t.
Amun ittwassen s waccawen d uzellif n ikarri, mamk nssen ikarri ɣer Imaziɣen ɣer-s ccan yemɣar, netta d amatar n tarwa d uɣemmuy d tezmart (leqsuḥeyyet).
Mamek nettaf yenna Èmile laoust » bujellud wer yelli d taqessart waha, ulid d taḍeḥḥakt waha, bujellud netta zi leewayd n Imaziɣen umi ttuɣa ttamnen s wamun akuc n ukarri ».

« S tririt n 22 furar d Ass aɣelnaw n tegmat akked temyamaẓt Aɣref-Taredsa, Aselway Tebboune yefka akk inumak i yizalen n temsetlelt, n tdukli, n tegmat akked temyamaẓt gar uɣref akked Tredsa-s i lfayda n tugdut akked usnefli i ttraǧun akk deg wakal n tmurt », i d-yenna Mass Belhimer almend n usfugel n umulli wis 2 n wass-a aɣelnaw.
Tamyamaẓt-a, ur tɣelli ara tbedd mgal n uhuccu, i yerna yenna-d, « tessebrer akk ineɛruḍen n uceqqeq userhef, mi d-yella umussu n 22 furar 2019, i wumi nesfugel amulli-s wis 2 s tuzzya ɣer lebni n Lezzayer tamaynut ».
« Asenṣeb n Wass-a » yusa-d ad yesseǧhed n uẓu n useɣwen n tidet yerna d afeɣnam yemmal-d tuṭṭfa tamezruyant iǧehden gar Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfant akked Uɣlan », i d-yezzireg.
Iger-d tamawt dakken deg Lezzayer, Taredsa akked Uɣref « d izri akked yimal ucrik akked yimal yelhan iɣef xelṣen tabzert tameqqran Yimeɣrasen-nneɣ deg tallit n uzbu mgal n yiwet seg tdusiyin n thersa iǧehden n tallit-nni ».

Azlawi d umari Arifi Sifaw Lhanis (Sufiyan Lhani), ttuɣa izwar-as issufeɣ-d deg usegg°as n 2018 ijjen cwayt zeg wamud-nnes n yezlan « Tifray ». Di 14 Nufember yegga-d x facebook-nnes, ila igga ad d-issers adlis-nnes s « PDF » maḥend ad yaweḍ ɣer waṭṭas n midden ad t-ɣren. Maca yenna ila ixes ad zzag-s irni ijjen 100 nniḍen i yenni ittexsen ad ɣren s tewriqt, ad t-jjen ɣer-sen. Lhanis yura tiqessisin-nnes s ict tiɣsit tefrez, ittegg tabridt-nnes deg yiger n tira s Tmaziɣt n Arrif.
Deg wayuren i yeɛdan, ttuɣa ifsar-d ungal-nnes « ad texsed! », mamec ttuɣa i das-izwar ifser-it-id s Teɛrabt deg iseggusa i yeɛdan. Lhanis d ijjen zeg iḥudriyen Irifiyen ig ittcuqqan abrid deg yiger n tira.
Site n "www.lerifain.fr" d ijjen uraq mani nettari s Tmaziɣt waha, dag-s ineɣmisen d merra mayen yeqqnen ɣer tira, aya d tizemmar zeg iḥudriyen maḥend Tmaziɣt n Arrif ad kid-s nennum di tira, ad yemɣar wagra-nnes n tira.

Tamurt n yeqbayliyen, d tamurt i cebḥen, d tin ara yessemlilen imdanen n yal tamnaṭ di talwit, tuɣal d tamurt n ccwal, acuɣer? Acku ccwal yellan ger At Ufella, d win yersen ɣef tsertit, maca ssxedmen tamurt n yiqbayliyen d lkarḍa akken ad awḍen iswi-nnsen.
Iqbayliyen d atmaten n yiwen ubabat, maca yal yiwen s anda ijebbed.
Iqbayliyen akk ur qbilen ara ad tenger cetla-nnsen, ur qbilen ara tamttant n tutlayt-nnsen.
Segmi ur d-telli talwit ger iqbayliyen, simmal ccwal yettnerni ger iqbayliyen.
Ass-
... (74 chars skipped) ... 
t n yiqbayliyen, d tamurt yelhan aṭas deg umaḍal mechur yisem-is tezmer ad tecbu Swis tamecṭuḥt, d tin ɣer ara d-rzun medden meṛṛa.
At Ufella d wid yessimɣuren ccwal ama iḍelli ama ass-a, d wid yebɣan ad snegren laṣel s yisem n tsertit…Am akken tamurt ur tezmir ara ad ttnerni s Weqbayli.
Deg iseggasen-agi ineggura, tilufa ttzident di tmurt n Yeqbayliyen, yal wa d asɣar i d-irennu i tmes. Maca, ma ad asen-tesleḍ ttmeslayen ɣef tmurt n leqbayel ulac win ur as-nebɣi talwit.
At Ufella daɣen cennun s
... (74 chars skipped) ...
awen, d tilawt, ur bɣin ara ad telhu tmurt n yeqbayliyen acku aṭas n tɣawsiwin ara asen-yefɣen afus ama i Yat Ufella am d wid yeddan yid-sen.
Amek ara terfed iman-is tmurt n yeqbayliyen ma yella At Ufella ara tt-yesnernin,rran-tt d anar n ccwal, akken Aqbayli ur d-irfed ara aqerruy-is?
Ineggura-agi, d wid yesnen anagar ccwal i tmurt n yeqbayliyen. D wid iɣeṭṭlen tawaɣit ɣef wegdud Aqbayli.
Amer d lebɣi, At Ufella d wid i ten-yecban ad qimen deg wemkan-nnsen, ad ǧǧen Aqbayli ad yessali tamurt-is.

Aṭṭas n Irifiyen lxir iqqen ɣer-sen ɣer tnayen tmaslayin: « tamzyida d imeḍlan ». Mala tennid- as i « lmuḥsin » Arifi ixess-aneɣ minzi ɣa nebna tamzyida niɣ ad tt-needel wer dak-tt-itterri deg wudem niɣ mala tennid-as a nseɣ tammurt ad tt-nerr d imeḍlan niɣ a needel imeḍlan ad ak-yini ticti akid-k iswiza. Manaya ig ijjin azgen ameqqran n dcurat di Arif dag-sen 20 n yewdan d tlata n tamzyidawin.
Xemmemt kid-i maelik bnadem Arifi issen ad yegg lxir. Ili aqqa-aneɣ ḥsen zi mindi nella lexxu. Cḥar iseggusa neccin ntettar spitar n uxenzir (cancer) zi ddewla ead aqqa-aneɣ nettraja. Araji-ya yejja aṭṭas n Irifiyen ttmettan minzi wer ɣer-sen minzi ɣa raḥen ɣer Fas niɣ Wejda maḥend ad ggen ccimyu. Suya mayemmi wer netteg spitar-a i yexf-nneɣ? Nec ttwaliɣ wer xaf-neɣ yuear ca.. Twiza-nni i itteg Arifi xef tmzyida ad tt-yeg x spitar waha.
Spitar d ameknaw (Exemple) waha, dini aṭṭas n tmeslayin ixessa a xaf-sent swizan Irifiyen deg umcan n temzyidawin d imeḍlan. Min xef tuɣa sɣuyyun Irifiyen deg unhezzi n Arif. Nessen ila d lxedmett n ddewla, maca nzemmar a negg cway zi manayenni ra d neccin a nessanqes cwayt n dqqer d ifeqqusen x wuerur n wayawya d wuerur n Arif.
Yura-t: Jaouad Labrouzi

Aselway-anemhal amatu n Sonelhaz, ay yellan yessefqad yiwet n tyunt tamgurant tusligt n ufares n yiferki uɣusan deg wasun n urmud n Ɛin Wessara (100 n yikilumitren deg ugafa n Ǧelfa), yenna-d dakken wa d « amedya amuddir n tesnuddest n teṛmist (n Sonelgaz) deg tmunit yezgan n yimseftiyen akken ad asen-d-tessis taẓwert (urrig d tetrist) ladɣa imi ay tesɛa tixxutert d tameqqrant deg tẓeḍḍawt tamgurant ».
« Ad nkemmel tuɣdaḍt-nneɣ tagejdant i tuqqna ɣer yiẓeḍwa n tetrist d wurrig », ɣef wakken ay d-yerna, « d acu kan, nessefray daɣ ad d-nesseɣnew ansa n ujenyuṛ n temhal tinezzanin deg tneggiwin tinezzanin yernu tuɣdaḍt-nnes d tamunit n yimseftiyen mi ara d-fken ikaramen ayyes ara ssutren taẓwert (tatrist d wurrig) », ɣef wakken ay d-ixebber.
Mass Boulakhras yessegza-d, seg yidis niḍen, dakken anermis-a usrid d yimguranen « d win ara yeǧǧen taṛmist ad teg tagermant mer ad tegzem teẓwert ».
« Tamhelt-a d tin ara nernu ɣer yifecka niḍen n usetrer ay teḍfer Sonelgaz, gar-asen asemḍen d yimeẓla inemgagen », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna.

Akal (amtiweg)
Akal d amtiweg n Unagraw Afuyan, yaggug (yebɛed) s wazal en 150 ugendid kilumiter ɣef Tfuyt ay ɣef yettezzi.
Akal d netta yellan d amtiweg asuf yettwassnen tella deg-s tudert. Akal yettezzi (yettenneḍ) ɣef tfukt s tazzla n 108.000 n yikilumitren i tamert yerna yettɣima 365 en wussan akken ad yegg tuzzya yemdan (d-tenn umi neqqaṛ aseggas n tfukt).
Akal yettezzi daɣen ɣef yiman nnes yerna yettɣimi 23 n timar (tisaɛtin) d 56 n tminutin akken ad ifak tuzzya nnes (d-tin umi neqqaṛ ass). Akal ila (yesɛa) kan yiwen n wayyur ay yettezzin (yettennḍen) fella-s deg wazal n 27 en wussan, yerna yiggʷej (yebɛed) fella-s s 384.000 n yikilumitren.

Mazal ur yewwiv waggur $ef ttawil n usiwev n yinelmaden n taddart n Semmache, iwakken ad d-yas lexbar yessexsin lferê-agi. Di tu$alin-is ass n lexmis mi d-yessawev inelmaden, lkar-agi tqubel-it-id yiwet n twa$it n ubrid it-yerran di rrif, ur neéri $er melmi ara yettwaseggem.
Lmusiba-agi, i d-ixelfen s lexsara di cci, tessegra-d anehhar d win iteddun yid-s, imi kecmen s ixxamen nsen di laman.
Iwakken ad d-nesmekti, tawa$it-agi tessegla-d s lmut n yiwet n tmeîîut d sin n yimejraê. $ef akken i y-d-ulsen wid yeéran tadyant-agi, tagi yemmuten, yu$ lêal tusa-d s lem$awla, degmi i tt-id-iqubel yiwen n ukamyun, yeffe$-itt leeqel, d$a terra-d qbala $er lkar-agi i yeff$en seg ubrid.
£ef aya, nezmer ad d-nini belli abrid a$elnaw wis 5 yu$al d aqadus n lmut, imi aêric ameqran n yinehharen ula ttqadaren ara leqwanen n ubrid. A$sab di tikli d ssebba tameqrant n twa$iwin i d- iverrun.

Imezdaɣ n Ḥizer fɣen-d taṣebḥit n wass-a, 29 di wunbir, i wakken ad d-inin ala i tefranin i d-ihegga udabu azzayri, belɛen tiwwura n waṭas n iɣarbazen anda i d-llant tefranin.
Ma yella d imezdaɣ n Aɣbalu, nitni fkan maḍi times i isendyaq n tefranin, acku kren-d mgal tifranin agi i d-ihegga udabu, imi walan ur llint d tifranin n tezdeg, yerna ẓran belli Tamurt n Iqbayliyen teṭṭef ceḥna i udabu, ɣef ayen akk yexdem deg-s n lbaṭel.
Di taddart n Tqarbuzt yekker umennuɣ ger imezdaɣ d iserdasen, aya yezmer ad yili d ugur i tefranin ur ttɛeddayent ara akken yenwa udabu.
(Taɣbalut: Siwel)

Aqqa-t di 60 n iseggusa, 16 Mayyu 1960, tettwag tfawt n llayzer tamzwarut. Yercem beddu n ijjen wakud d amaynu, ass-a wer nzemmer ad nmeyyek x tatiknulujit-a. Bla zzag-s wer tettiri amprimunt. Ula d ikabliten n zzaj niɣ d lakiss (la caisse) di leswaq. Iger n sseḥḥet la d netta, Tinɛacin, tussna, d taṣennaɛt. Llayzer yedwel zeg iqedwaḥ wer xf nzemmer a naggʷej.
Maca mayemmi qaɛ tfawt‑a iqessen d leɛjeb anict uya?
Adu qaɛ rirat s tfawt, llayzer d netta izemmren i kulci. Muḥal ma yella ca n iger ma
... (1027 chars skipped) ... 
‑nsen, dellqen i inirji-nnes dag‑sen d zzyada, Inirji‑ya tteffeɣ‑dd d ifutunen.
Ḥima ad ttmun tfawt ɣa yeggen llayzer, ixessa ca n ḥajet ɣa yessiɣen iliktrunen‑nni ca n ḥajet ten‑ɣa‑yejjen ad dewlen deg ict twarat marra. ad tedleq i yijen Tirucac n ifuṭunen. Senslet‑a n usiɣ d usixwi n inrji, qqaren‑as Stimulated Emission, senni i d-yekka isem n llayzer (Lasel: « Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation“)
Theodore Maiman: llayzer n lyaqut amzwar (Ruby laser)
Amezwar yessarsen tati
... (1027 chars skipped) ...
qqayen imeẓẓyanen yeṭṭawen. Di trezzut tamassant, wer nzemmer ad xaf‑s nekkes. Ula deg wṣenneɛ d lxedmet: Ittqessas uzzal, isnuqqub, itcurḍer. Minzi tisfay-nnes, iyya ad dag‑sent triglid, ad tsaqared llayzer i ɣa ynefɛen, i lxedmet i texsed.
Llayzer icuq la d ajenna: zzag‑sen i wezznen isatiliten lagʷajet x ijjen wenniḍen, niɣ sqadan DATA. Amṣawaḍ n wanict (Quantum communication) zi tmurt akd usatilit yella zzag‑s. Deg unebdu 2017 yesqad-d ijjen usatilit d Acinwi 2 n llayzer ɣer tmurt.

Karl Marx
Karl Heinrich Marx, illul deg 5 si Magu deg ussegwas 1818 di tmurt n Treves illan di Rhenanie tamurt n Lalman yemmut di 14 di Meɣres 1883 di temdint n Londres. Marx illa d argaz n tsertit u d-amesnagay ameqṛan, d netta id isnulfan ayen i wumi neqqar Tazdukla "le communisme", id yeqaren belli ulac amgarad ger imdanen Yas ulamma yella deg ixeddim nsen n yal ass.
[beddel] Tameddurmant
Ilul Karl Heinrich Marx di Treves asegwas n 1818. Yella d wis sin ger 8 Tam w-atmaten-is. Vava-s, Heinrich Marx (1782–1838), d-abugaṭu, yefrurid deg yiwet twacult twudayt Ackenaz. Jed-nsen Meier Halevi Marx yella dawday, m-ad mmi-s d warraw n mmi-s uYalen d-imasiḥiyen, ẓẓiẓrgen isem nsen Yer Heinrich iwakken ad izmiren ad xedmen, yemma-s n Karl, Henriette Pressburg (20 Yulyu 1788-30 Wamber 1863), d tawdayt n tmur bwadda.
[beddel] Tizrawtin ines
Yekcem Yer Gymnasium Friedrich-Wilhelm n Treves asegwas 1830. m-id yebwi Abitur ines, yekcem Yer tseddawit, di tazwara di Bonn tuber asegwas 1835 iwakken ad ilmed azref, dinna yebwid aselkin di tagara usegwas, sinna di Berlin di tseddawit Friedrich-Wilhelm si meYres 1836 yelhad kan d-umezruy d tesnagayt, yekfa tizrawtin ines asegwas n 1841.

Robert Schumann
Robert Schumann (8 yunyu 1810 - 29 yulyu 1856) d amaskar n uẓawan Analman yettumeggez ɣer kra n yimezɣanen d ameskar n uẓawan amaway (ifazen) yakk deg umussu Analman arumantik tettwazuzer tmelta-ynes s usrag (s ssebba) n tmaskarin-is igerrzen ɣef upyanu, Timaskarin-is sgensisent snat n tegnatin tusnamnanin yettmegdalen i uẓawan arumantik, yiwet deg-sent d awliwlan anagnag tayeḍ d amsiked arusan. yella d argaz n temseddast Clara Schumann, Robert d mmi-s n Augustin Schumann yellan d amsenzu n yidlisen d umazrag. ttunefkent-as temsirin n urar ɣef upyanu deg waddar-is (leemer-is) 7 n yiseggasen

Timlilit n uciwer d umtawa ger umaray amatu n usqamu unnig n timuzɣa, d uneɣlaf n tmerrit d tinḍi d umahil awaclan.
Ass n warim 22 Duǧember 2020,aneɣlaf n tmerrit d tinḍi d umahil awaclan, Mass Muḥamed Ḥamidu deg asun nsen aɣelfan yemlal d mass Si Lhacmi Ɛassad, amaray amatu n usqamu unnig n timuzɣa.
Ilmend n temlilit-agi n uciwer d umtawa d-yellan gar-asen yella-d wawal ɣef utteki n uḥric n tmerrit d tinḍi, deg tfugla taɣelnawt tunṣibt yerzan tameɣra n umenzu n yennayer 2971.
Akken meslayen daɣen ɣef uɛiwed n usmaynu n umtawa ger snat n tsudwin yettwazemlen ass n 17 yennayer 2016, d uheggi n usuddes temlilit ara d-yawin ɣef tririt n wazal i wadeg amerray, iɣzer n ɣufi di twilayt n Tbatent, i useggas d-iteddun.
i usmekti, timlilit-a yettwaɛeggen ad d-tili deg aggur n yebrir yzrir, maca tettwadegger sebba n waṭṭan n Kuruna Covid_19.

Tella-d tejmilt-agi, tasebḥit n wass-nni n lhed yezrin 20 ɣuct 2017, deg taddart n Ikhelfounéne, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Bounouh akked ladayra n Boughni, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D tajmilt i ḥedren waṭas n yiwudam, gar-asen: Aɣella n ladayra n Boughni, aselway n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Bounouh, i

un ɣef umjahed d ucennay-agi Farid Ali, d wayen akk yexdem ama deg ccna neɣ deg tegrawla tazzayrit 1954-1962. Syin akin xedmen akk wid yellan din ddqiqa n tsusmi ɣef rruḥ-s d lerwaḥ n ccuhada merra. Sakin d taɣuri n lfatiḥ sɣur ccix n lǧameɛ n taddart n Ikhelounéne. Syin ɣur-s d asersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s yellan deg tmeqbart n taddart. Nnan-d yimsuddsen n tedyant-a, ass n usamas, dakken asenfar amezwaru irebḥen d win yerzan tasnulzuzt tamerrant yernu wa d asnas ara yeǧǧen amerray ad yessen isemlan n temnaḍt aydeg yella.
Asenfar wis sin d win n sin n yilemẓiyen n 17 n yiseggasen yernu yerza afares n yigersalen d usenzi-nsen i tneččiyin.
Ma d asenfar wis kraḍ yeqqen ɣer tdawsa d tɣellist tanmettit yernu yerza abaḍi n tetrist d wurrig deg uxxam. Asenfar-a yebda yettnuzu, ɣef wakken ay d-nettwaxebber.
Yenna-d uselway n Teṛmist Tazzayrit n Usmal n Uṛmas d Udhal n Tgemma, Adlane Chaouch, dakken awanak d wakk tisuda-nnes, dehhlen tisentayin tiṛmasanin d tmelwi n yiweẓla ladɣa deffir ma ɣetsen yiduba unnigen n tmurt akken ad reẓmen akk tiwwura i tsentayin d yirmuden ara inefɛen aṛmas d usileɣ n tsutiwin timaynutin akken ad derwent deg unegmu aɣelnaw.
Taẓrigt tis 4 n Ugrur Azzayri n Tfazit n Skikda d tin aydeg derwen 50 n yilemẓiyen yesɛan isenfaren d isfaranen.

Azul a GMA ƐZIZEN,
Wissen amek-ik ass-a deg uxemmuj-nni amcum?
Ẓriɣ ala iɣsan-ik i d-yeqqimen deg-k, ḥsiɣ am kečč am wid akk yeddan deg ubrid-ik, ur ken-yettcuḥu uweṭṭuf armi i ken-ifukk.
Ass-a d ass n tlalit-ik amezwaru ara teseeddiḍ dinna, war tawacult-ik i izedɣen ul-ik d yidammen-ik. Tinna ɣef wacu terɣiḍ, tesseḥbibireḍ, tin akken i k-yecqan uqbel kullec.
Ḥsiɣ a gma ezuzu s yidis n Kaysa d Dadda Lewnis i telliḍ. Meena zriɣ ur tecrihem ara akken iwata, acku nxus-iken, ur nelli ara yid-wen.
Ah
... (535 chars skipped) ... 
d-is s rrwaḥ-ik a gma.
nezga d imeḥbas n lxiq, lxiq-nni ur nesei tifrat.
Γas aktayen leali i aɣ-icerken, ssifsusen fell-aɣ, besseḥ nugi ad nessusem ɣef kečč i aɣ-iruḥen. D asegna i d taduli n wussan-nneɣ, tenfa tumert s wulawen-nneɣ.
Suref-iyi a gma n tasa, zriɣ ur tḥemmleḍ asḥissef d ucetki, imi tkesbeḍ tabɣest d leeqel nnig tilas. Wanag ur yelli d nekk i d-yennan ayagi akkit, d ul-iw i d-ineṭqen, d aḥulfu n tegmat i aɣ-yezdin i yugin ad yesber.
Ḥsiɣ tettwissiḍ-iyi ɣef tebɣest di ddunit-a timee
... (535 chars skipped) ...
 Kaysa.
Ɛuhdeɣ-k a gma ur briɣ i yimenzayen-ik s wacu i telliḍ tettedduḍ. Ad defreɣ abrid-ik, ad sferfreɣ tiktiwin-ik, ad tebeeɣ lǧerra n yiḍarren-ik. Ad ssidreɣ asirem-ik, ad nnaɣeɣ, ad kemmleɣ i umennuɣ-ik.

Yura-tt: Bernard Lugan
Deg wakud n uzarug, umi ttuɣa ifukk ad tili ijjen tmunit jer iferdas i yemsebḍan i yellan di Dzayer taḥudrit, maca tamunit-a tettwagg x webrid n ijjen unasyunalizem d “aɛrabu-meslem” i inekren timmuzɣa n tmurt. Iwa, xenni i iqessen iẓuran n tcejjert tadzayrit.
Deg useggʷas n 1962, awzir adzayri n uselmed anamur Ɛebderreḥman Ben Ḥmida, yenna aqqa “Imaziɣen saqaren-ten-d ibabaten icemlalen“. Zeɛma ixes ad yini, ḥuma ad tilid d Amaziɣ maci tili txelqed-d amenni, maca tiweḍed 
... (982 chars skipped) ... 
seggʷas n 1962, ḥa yewweḍ-d uzarug, tekkes lḥukuma tadzayrit lkursi n teqbaylit zi tesdawit n Dzayer. Ddegg-a n tukksa i tegga temmal-d mani txes ad traḥ zi tmurt, tuzrift ɣer usistim-a tbedd x unkar-nnes i umezruy n Imaziɣen. Ɣer imɣaren idzayriyen aɛrabfunen, malla dinni tutriwin timaziɣin manaya ittas-d kuntra i Lislam d teɛrabt.
Ɛlaḥsab imɣaren idzayriyen i yewwḍen ɣer udabu deg useggʷas n 1962, bnadem malla d ameslem ixess-as ad iqqen ɣer “l’umma”, ɣer tɣerma taɛrabt. Mala timmuzɣa temmal-d
... (982 chars skipped) ...
. Zi senni, wer iqqim Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed issawal ɛad x Timmuzɣa, maca x tsusyalist d tdimukratit. Maca ttuɣa ittawi-d ɣer-s ɣer umulli-nnes ḥa Imaziɣen, nessawal da x FFS i yegga deg useggʷas n 1963. Zegga yerwel Ayt Ḥmed zi leḥbes deg useggʷas n 1966, irwel ɣer berra, maca wer iqqim ittegg ca n yiḍis.
Aked ukulunil Hewwari Bumedyen, tedwel tasertit n usɛerreb d tasistimatikt, i ibedden ɣer mani iwweḍ wegraw n usɛerreb deg useggʷas n 1975, i yerrin tamurt d taɛrabt inker merra mayen yellan d Amaziɣ.

Lexṣas n uyefki deg tḥuna yuɣal d aɣbel n twaculin merra. Luzinat n
uyefki ur ṣawḍen ara ad sekfun wid i d-yessuturen ayefki-ayi.
Ssebba n lqella n uyefki d akkken wid yellan d imḍebren ɣef luzinat n uyefki ( Dree Ben Xedda, Tazmalt, Aqbu, Amizur…) ur sawḍen ara a d-aɣen awren n uyefki seg Fransa neɣ seg NouYelle Zélande s ssuma izaden aṭas. Imdanen ikcem-iten lḥir imi ittuhttem fell-asen ad aɣen ayefki n uwren ( leḥḍa).
Suma n Uneggaru agi tettqam-d 10 tikal ɣef suma n uyefki n tculiṭ. Ass-a nettwali imdanen ttnadin ɣef tculiṭ n uyefki. Win i d-saḥ tculiṭ n uyefki ittuḥttem fell-as ad yaɣ isufar nniḍen!

Xas akken yekker-d akin i tlisa n tmurt meena laṣlis ur t-yezgil ara. Yerza-d Yer tmurt n leqbaylit d anadi Yef yiẓuran-is : tawacult n Eemruc. Nemlal-it deg Tizi Uzzu, yemmeslay-aY-d, s kra n wawalen, Yef usenfar i d-yettheggi.
AYmis n YimaziYen : amek i d-tufiḍ lğerra n lejdud-ik ?
Yann Seweryn : Ur ssineY ara Taous Amrouche, jida ; nettat temmut deg useggas 1976, nekk luleY-d deg useggas n 1982. Acu kan, yemma trebbayi-d deg leewayed n leqbayel, tessekcem-iyi deg yidles aqbayli. Akka ihi ay sneY jida , Taous Amrouche, mebla ma walaY-tt.
Yeeğeb-ik, ihi, yidles aqbayli ?
Yeeğeb-iyi nezzeh, mačči d izli. FerḥeY imi lliY deg-s. DYa, bYiY ad ẓreY ugar Yef tmurt n yimawlan-iw. BYiY ad tt-waliY s wallen-iw.
Melmi i d-tusiḍ i tikelt tamezwarut Yer tmurt ?
Yann Seweryn : deg useggas n 2006 i d-kecmeY tamurt n leqbayel. RuḥeY s IYzer Ameqqran Yer Bouguermouh. Netta, d ameddakel n les Amrouche, yenna-yi-d aṭas Yef twacult-iw. Am wakken i d-zṛiY imekkwan anda ddren imawlan-iw.
Syin, dYa, i ak-d-tusa tikti n usaru Yef jida-k.
Yann Seweryn : d tidet, imir ay d-tusa tikti-agi n usaru. D yiwet n teswiet i yesean azal d ameqqran. D talallit-nniḍen. Syin ihi i bdiY anadi Yef yiẓuran-iw i wakken ad xedmeY yiwen n usaru Yef Taous Amrouche. U yal tikkelt mi ara d-uYaleY Yer tmurt, ttnernin yiḥulfan-iw.

Ayen d iteddun, ayen yuran. Yal wa d amek t-ifehhem, t-yettwali. Ayen umi neqqar “lmektub” neɣ ahat “immal yettwajerden”. D acu n tikta ara nettef deg ayen yeɛnan immal, d usirem di tudert s umata. D ayen yellan yakan yewjed yettraju tudert n yal amdan, neɣ yura deg iri n yal tudert.
Yettili-d umeslay deg ayagi. D ayen neqsed di tudert-nneɣ ara nidir ara nwali, neɣ ahat d ayen iɛeddan akkin i lebɣi-nneɣ n yal ass. Ahat daɣen a nsel i wid ara ɣ-d-immlen immal-nneɣ, s uxeyyel. Am akken llant tedya
... (598 chars skipped) ... 
 tudert.
Tikta n yimmal !
Ameslay ɣef ayen yeɛnan immal n tudert d aɛewwiq meqṛen i yal amdan. Yal wa d amek ara t-iqabel. S ixemmimen, s tikta, s temsalt n ddin d liman s umata. D asekkud n tudert i deg sbedden imusnawen d wid d-yessefhamen timsal s umata. Ɣer imusnawen igrigiyen di lemtel, tudert tuqqel d tadyant iweɛren, truḥ-as lbenna, axaṭeṛ d lmut i yurǧan akk yemdanen. Azal-agi a t-naf di yal asfelsef d ussefhem n ddunit. Skud mačči aṭas deg-sen i yettamnen s tudert akkin i lmut. Asirem-n
... (598 chars skipped) ...
s. Ayen d-iteddun, a t-nidir s liman. Axaṭeṛ Ṛebbi yella. D tidett. Yenjer-d abrid i yal amdan. Yesbedd tamsisit ger-as d yemdanen iwakken ad idiren yid-s, ad bnun tudert-nsen yid-s, s leɛnaya-ines. Ihi, ɣer tagara, d liman i d tasarut i s ara nelli ticerkett-agi n yimmal n tudert. A d-nini, ayen d-iteddun, d ayen yellan di lebɣi n Ṛebbi yeddren. Nekni a t-nraju s talwit, s liman. Yessa-ɣ-d Lmasiḥ tafat. “D abrid, d tidett, d tudert”. S ḥeggu-ines yelli-d abrid i tudert d usirem. (Yuḥenna 14:6).

Muḥammad Albnsir
Iga Muḥmmad Ajaḥud (1937-1989) ittussann s rrays Muḥmmad Albnsir nɣ Ddmsiri rrays d unaẓuṛ n uẓawan ittussann bahra ɣ ugns ula ɣ bṛṛa n tmazirt, ilul ɣ 1936 ɣ Tamsult tama n Tarudant d Imi n ṭanut ɣ taqbilt n Dmsira, wayni izri mnaw isgasn ɣ Tigmmi Tumlilt.
Iḥsa lqṛan ɣ tmzgida n tmazirt nns ɣ tmẓi nns, wayni ifaɣ aykat ribab ayliɣ itawsan ɣ 1963. ɣkodan ayfta aytirir ɣ timizar n urupa zund Fransa, Bljika, Lalman d Swisra.
Isbidt lmxzn ɣ 1981 lliɣ yura tamdyazt n Aggurn.

Kulunya
Tga Kulunya (s tlimant: Köln) yat tiɣrmt ɣ twilayt n Rayn Wisfalya n ugafa g utaram n Almanya. Ilkm wuṭṭun n imzdaɣ nns uggar n 1.034.175 n ufgan ɣ usiḍn n usggʷas 2013, dffir maya tga tiɣrmt tis kkuẓt nna akkʷ imqqurn g almanya dffir Birlin, Hamburg d Myunix. Tzga tɣrmt Kulunya f wasif n Rayn gr tiɣrmin n Bun d Dusldurf.
Zɣ idrizn nns imazrayn tlla tkatridaralt n Kulunya nna yuɣaln i uzmz arumani nna illan ɣ tlgamt n Yunisku i taysi tamaḍlant. Tga Kulunya zɣ wammasn imqurn n usslmd ɣ utaram n Lalman s usrag n tillit n tsdawit n Kulunya d tsdawit n Kulunya i tmassnin timskrin d kigan n wammasn aḍnin n usslmd d urzzu, ɣmklli gis illa wammas n umaris n tnbaḍt tafidiralit talmanit i uḥṭṭu n tmnḍawt.
Llan ɣ tɣrmt n Kulunya agudi n israsn n inzwayn d itiliẓriyn ɣ tmazirt n Almanya. Ɣmk illa dis iggi n 60 n taddart n ufasr, d 200 n tmssiggzt ɣmklli gis 70 n uɣmis d tsɣunt nna ittfuɣn ku ass zɣ tɣrmt s timnaḍin kullutn n Almanya d Uruppa. Aɣlad Midyabark ɣ ugafa ataram n tɣrmt illa gis wuṭṭun mqqurn n tdrawin n uslkim, ashil d umyawaḍ. Zɣ ixatarn n inmuggarn n tdlsa illa anmuggar n Rrayn i usbnubk nna ittilin ku asggas ɣ wayyur n bṛayṛ, d unmuggar n Ccklaṭ. d kigan n inmuggarn yaḍnin.
Amgrad ad iga amud, imẓẓiy ka sul. Aws i Wikipidya s usnfl nns, tssimɣurt t.

Asismel n Cronquist
Anagraw n Cronquist i wsismel n yimɣan d yiwen n unagraw n usismel itraren id yennulfan i wsismel n yimɣan yeǧǧuǧǧugen, Anagraw-a yettwafsar sɣur umusnaw n yimɣan n Marikan Arthur Cronquist s agensu n yidṛisen yidlisen-is Anagraw ummid i wsismel n yimɣan yeǧǧuǧǧugen (1981) yakk d temhazt d usismel n yimɣan yeǧǧuǧǧugen taẓrigt tamenzut deg 1968 sin akin taẓrigt tis snat 1988)
Arthur Cronquist yessers imɣan yeǧǧuǧǧugen deg sin yismilen meqqren igan d tasnayyawin yakk d taynayyawin, sin akin yegzem imɣan ar idu-smilen anda llant tfesniwin

Ǧeɛfer Cibani
ǧeɛfer Cibani d amyaru, d amdan n umezgun, d amyurar n isura d tmezgunin, d yiwen ger imeddukal n Muḥend u Yeḥya, yeqedec yid-s u yekki deg terbaɛt Muḥ Terri yuraren timezgunin-is deg iseggasen n 80 : Si Pertuf, Am win yettṛajun Ṛebbi, Si Leḥlu…am akken yurar deg usaru "Muḥend u Caɛban" (1994) iga Rezqi Harani i tceqquft n Muḥya id yerra ar tazwawt seg udlis "Le Ressuscité" n umyaru n tmurt n Cenwa 'Luxun'. Yurar daɣen deg kra n isura irumyen am “L’amour tagué” (1995) n Bruno Carrière akk d “Avant l’oubli” (2004) n Augustin Burger. Deg useggas 1994, yessufeɣ-d adlis ɣer tezrigin SEELF i wumi imud azwel "Ddeqs nneɣ" (a d-nawi awal fell-as tikelt nniḍen). "Ddeqs nneɣ" yewwi-d ɣef tudert n yal ass, timsal yedder netta, timucuha timectaḥ ssawalen at zik…
Dda ǧaɛfer mačči kan d aya. D yiwen seg yemɣaren n tudrin nneɣ iwumi weznen lehḍur, wid ɣer tella tmussni. Taqbaylit ɣur-s d urar s wawalen, d ameslay s yinzan: Ayen yebɣu wemdan a t-id yini s tutlayt nniḍen, netta ɣur-s tiririt s teqbaylit. D agerruj wer nettfaka. Ass-a mi yewwi “lantrit”, yessawal timucuha di Fṛansa, timucuha izedɣen cfawat n temẓi-s.

Macahu, d yiwet n terbaɛt n umezgun i d-ilulen, deg useggas n 2008, deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Iferḥunen sɣur wid i iḥemmlen amezgun. Ixeddem-asen asileɣ Mass Houche Abderrahman , syin akin, heggan-d tamezgunt tamezwarut iwumi i yefka azwel “Ulac El ḥarga ulac” . Mbaɛd, terna texdem terbaɛt-agi tis snat s uzwel “Lunǧa” i yewwin arraz amenzu deg Tfaska taɣelnawt n umezgun s tutlayt n Tmaziɣt di Tbatent di teẓrigt-is tamzwarut deg useggas n 2010.
Imir i as-semman Macahu i terbaɛt-agi. Gar w
... (356 chars skipped) ... 
temdini-nniḍen. “Taḍṣa di twaɣit” i d-yufraren akken ilaq, tewwi arrazen-agi : Arraz amezwaru n Tfaska taɣelnawt n umezgun abujad di temdint n Mestɣanem. Arraz di Tfaska taɣelnawt n umezgun di Tbatent. Arraz deg Tfaska Malek Bugermuḥ di Bgayet.
Arraz n udrar deg At Buɛeddu, Tizi Uzzu. Arraz deg Tfaska n umezgun deg Yiɣẓer Ameqqran deg Bgayet. Akken, daɣen, tettekka terbaɛt-agi deg tfaskiwin tigraɣlanin am Tfaska tagraɣlant n umezgun deg Gafsa di tmurt n Tunes. Sadek Yusfi i yellan akka tura d aq
... (356 chars skipped) ...
n tamezgunt “Anwa Kečč” s wayes i d-tuffrar.
Nesteqsa-d Mass Sadeq Yusfi ɣer lesrar n waya, yenna-d : “Ilmeẓyen i ixeddmen deg tddukkliwin, ḥemmlen aṭas amezgun, sɛan tabɣest deg wayen xeddmen. ladɣa imi isentalen i d-ttawin, rzan talsa s lekmal-is. Nessaram ad ilint tfaskiwin ugar n wanect-agi akken ad nesuzer leqdic-agi i nxeddem di yal tamdint, acku tifaskiwin, d tiswiɛin anda i nettemlili akked waṭas n trebuyaɛ-nniḍen n umezgun, syin akin ttlalent-d tmussniwin akked tusniwin”.

ṬṬAREF – Twekked-d tneɣlaft n temsetlelt taɣelnawt, Ghania Eddalia, ass n usamas (lḥedd) deg Ṭṭaref, ɣef tixxutert n ubdad adawsan « iwatan » i yimɣaren yesɛan aḍḍanen n tnefsit yernu yewweḍ umḍan-nsen ɣer 601 deg wammasen yemmuzzgen deg wakk timnaḍin n tmurt.

... (615 chars skipped) ... 
oune, ass n usiḍyas (ssebt) deg Leblida, kra n temṣukin n tɣellist deg twilayt-a, yernu iga aya ɣer yidis n unemhal amatu n tɣellist taɣelnawt, Abdelkader Kara Bouhadba.
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Tenna-d tnesmigalt taɣelnawt, taselwayt n Ugman Aɣelnaw n Ummesten d Usmal n Tgerda, Meriem Chorfi, ass n ukras (laṛenɛa) deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, dakken tinigrin tisensegmanin sɛant azal deg ussegmi d umzel n yigerdan s umata d yigerdan imeɛdaṛ s lxuṣuṣ.

yen) deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, dakken la d-ttheyyin aɣawas aɣelnaw n tdawsa n umahil, d win yeqqnen ɣer tdawsa, taɣellist n umahil d ussekmem n tfimant deg twennaḍt tamsadurt.
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Aneɣlaf n Ugensu, n Tnbaziyin tidiganin akked Uṣeggem n wakal yebda, melmi kan, yiwet n tigawt n usileɣ i lfayda n yinedbalen n teflist i yerzan deg tedwilt-is tamezwarut, 78 inawaren i d-yekkan seg tenbaziyin tidiganin n temnaḍt n Utaram, ad rnun sya d afella 86 n yinawaren n tlemmast akked ugmuḍ n tmurt.

Mermi mma nufa akud ibedd war iggur a nerzu mindi ɣa nirar. Ha yin ittiraren ciṭranj ha yin ittiraren apartci yarecm-aneɣ-t azear xef tcuqqet tacemract minzi qa netta d anazur. Negga tabulart s uẓru n ṣṣabun nennḍ-as rciɣeḍ acemrar irseqq xef setta n udmawen. Zi ɣar ragwaj as-tiniḍ qa n tiḍet. Negga ra d rkarṭet s tqabsatin n flan i d- nesɣa. Nec rebda ttraɣan-ayi-d yin issnen i arrunda. Uca ntemeanad wi ɣar ixṣaren. Rebda nettemzawar jar-aneɣ tɣuyyit d umenɣi axmi nedja di reqhawi-nni n reqma.

"Brut-as i wawal-iw!"
Nufel ilul deg useggas 1981 di taddart At Yeččir, Tizi Γennif(Iflisen umellil), di tmurt n Yeqbayliyen.
Ngum ad yinig Yer tmurt n Sbanya deg useggas n 2009, yella d aselmad di tesdawit n Tizi Wezzu.
Si 2010 ar ass-a yettidir di tmurt n Ddanmark.
"Brut-as i wawal-iw!" d adlis-s amenzu s tmaziYt n yezwawen.
Idlisen d-yesker yakan s tutlayin tiwerdaniyin:
Pensées Pensantes, Tamedyazt, Ledzayer 2006
Espoirs Déchus, Ungal, Fransa 2008
Algérie : Banquet des nonchalances, Fransa 2
... (4324 chars skipped) ... 
nu s werfad uqerru, "idles tura yezger tilas, ay arrac ideflawen."
DaYen mi ara yeqqar wemdan amud-agi isefra, yal mi ara yekfu asefru, a t-yekcem lḥir ad iYer wayeḍ. Lhan akk, yal wa yewwi-d Yef usentel-is yerna imdanen yeggaren akka acemma tamawt i tsekla tagraYlant zemren a d-mlilen di yal asefru-s tamuYli neY talYa swayes yettaru umedyaz-a neY wayeḍ yellan ger imeqqranen umaḍal. Kra imedyaten kan:
- Deg usefru "Deg tmurt-iw" mlaleY-d d ijenniwen n Muḥya: Ad as-tiniḍ, d tamuYli-nni, d tamesla
... (4324 chars skipped) ...
meslayt, wala ad temmet tmeslayt a d-grin akk nutni.
Netta d iYeblan iḥulfan-nsen ten-yessumlen d lebda i ibubb neY i yerba deg iciwi usefru-s "RiY ad rewleY".
Ma d asefru-s "Awal umedyaz" akka i t-yekfa:
"Ldit allaɣ
Ldit ul d wallen
A d-iniɣ
A d-smireɣ
Ayen ẓriɣ, ayen riɣ
D wayen i d iyi-iceɣben"
Win iwumi ur yecrih ara wul-is yes-s, awer yecreh la netta, wala ayla-s!
Seid At Meemmer

Ur ‘’ttɛeṭṭilen’’ ara ad ciren aseḍru n yiwen n uhil n 800 tnezduɣin, tid i umi ttinin kerru-azenzi (AADL), deg tlemmast n tɣiwant n Tubiret, i d-yenna, ass n larebɛa, lwali, Nacer Maskri. Seg kfant tezrawin akked ufran n teṛmisin akken ad sseḍrun asenfar-a n 800 tnezduɣin (AADL), bḍan-tent ɣef sin yiḥricen n 400 iferdisen ara ciren war leɛḍil’’, i d-yessgzi, ɣer tama n yiwet n tfugla n usɣimi n uɣella amaynut n tdayrat n Yimecceddalen, Bouziane Derradji. Ttunefkent i tɣiwant n Ṣṣur Lɣezlan, 400 n tnezduɣin AADL nniḍen mazal tent-ciren seg tent-teǧǧa teṛmist taṭeṛkit, ‘’ihi ad nefren taṛmist nniḍen akken ad nezmer ad ncir, sya d afella, lebni-nsent’’, i d-yenna, Mass Maskri.

Tukkist tis-snat seg wungal «iḍ d wass » sɣur Ɛ.Mezdad
Tasa ur tessager yiwen. Maca d win i d-yufraren ger tarwa-s. D win i tḥemmel aṭas. Ur tuksan ara. D win i d amenzu i tessider. Ula d tuccent deg umadaɣ yezga yiwen ger tarwa-s yufrar-d ɣef wiyaḍ. Qqaren d ddnub ɣef tasa ma ur tessaɛdel tarwa-s, ma tella tneḥyaft gar-asen. Neţat ddnub ur t-tewwi ara : d ayen ara yečč wa i teţen wiyaḍ. D ayen ara yels i ţlusun daɣen.
Asmi meẓzi d amaɛlal kan, yeṛw
... (5416 chars skipped) ... 
ezger yeqnen azaglu. A-ţ-terr i ddel d tɛekkmin. Ur ţ-id-iṣaḥ yiḍes ar ad yali wass. Ur ţ-id-iṣaḥ ad terr awal ma ur ţ-yaɛǧib. Tadist deffir tayeḍ, dderya d inilban, am lbaṭata wa ur ireffed wa. Tamɣart d wemɣar si tama ad ţnezman fell-as. Tilewsatin si tama dderz-nnsent ad yesnunnut aṭas d aseggas. Akken ara tɣil ddunit qrib a-s-d-teḍs, mi jewǧent yakk tlewsatin, imɣaren wwḍen amkan-nnsen, imir-en ar ad d-teɣli fell-as txeṣsart taneggarut, yerna ur tebna fell-as.
Tekker lgirra. Ɣef medden yakk,
... (5416 chars skipped) ...
a tezgel. Iluxert, llan d icawraren, icawraren ad uɣalen d iluxert annect bɣun kken-t. Akka i taɛmer. Limer mačči akka imdanen ad myeččen gar-asen. Ugar ! Akka i d-yeǧǧa ṛebbi ddunit. Limer d lebɣi mi yemmut yiwen a-t-neǧǧ kan deg wemkan-is. «
Anagar di laɛwacer i tḥemmel a-ten-id-tebder. Limer ass-a mačči d amerḍil amzun d laɛwacer, ahat yiwen ur t-id-teţadder. Yerna tneddef tasa-s teţqeḍririf. Yekkat-iţ uzenneqnaq. Anda-t yiḍes, ma a-ţ-id-yas !

Tanmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tsebɣes akk inelmaden-is n kraḍ n yiswiren n ulmad, i d-yufraren deg yikayaden n taggara n useggas (5eme, BEM, BAC). Tella-d tmeɣra n tukci n warrzen i yinelmaden-agi ass-nni n letnayen iɛeddan 31yulyu 2017, deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu. Tɛedda tmeɣra-agi deg tegnatin n tumert d unecreḥ, ḥedren dina inelmaden d yimawlan-nsen akked twacult n usegmi s umata. Fkan azal n 161 n warrazen i lfayda n yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yikayaden-
... (819 chars skipped) ... 
qqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas Loutfi n Tizi Uzzu, s tenqiṭ n 18,72 ula d nettat. Ma d inelmaden i yewwin ugar n 18 wwḍen 15 n yinelmaden. Ma deg wayen yeenan amyezwar n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen: d aɣerbaz alemmas Nacaf Mohammed Akarou deg Afezzoun i yewwin amkan amezwaru. Syin deg umḍiq wis sin uɣerbaz alemmas uzzig “Tafsut”, syin akkin d aɣerbaz n umeɣras Ahmed Youcef n Mecṭras deg Buɣni. Syin deg umḍiq wis rebɛa d aɣerbaz uzzig “ijeǧǧigen n tefsut”, syin akkin d aɣerbaz n umeɣras Yahi n Tala Tgana n 
... (819 chars skipped) ...
, ma d uṭṭun n wid i d-yewwin ugar n 17/20 leḥqen 68. Ma deg wayen yeenan amyezwar n tesnawiyin: d tasnawit n Mohamed Said Diouani n Makouda i yewwin amkan amezwaru, ma d amḍiq wis sin tewwi-t tesnawit n Beni Zmenzer yellan deg Beni Douala, ma d tasnawit Ladlani Amar n Maâtkas tḥela-d amḍiq wis kraḍ. Tasnawit Khoass Ahcene n Lrebɛa NatYiraten teṭṭef amkan wis rebɛa deg umyezwar, ma d Ouerzzedine Achour n Tizi Γennif, ma d amḍiq wis seta yuɣal i tesnawit n Omar Toumi n Tegzirt.

... (1489 chars skipped) ...

Ihi, taggara n waya, nniɣ-d d akken tafizikt d tussna takusmulujit akked tesṭrufizikt, akken i tezga tettifrir, tettbeddil ayendin segmi yebda umezruy n talsa, i tezmer ad tfal ugar i tlisa n tizi n wass-a ɣer sdat.

ata. Buddeɣ-awen afud igerzen, d usiweḍ deg umecwar i yal yiwen. Ad nfakk, neɣ ad tt-nseqqef am wakken i d-tennid. S tekti-agi. nettimɣur, nettaẓ di leɛmer, tettnerni tmussni-nneɣ i lmend n tɣuri d unadi-nneɣ, d uselmed i d-nettawi mačči kan sɣur yibabaten-nneɣ. Maca, ula sɣur warraw-nneɣ xas ulamma d imeẓyanen. Han, deg tsehṛa-a, taneɣlaft n yidles d tẓuriwin, Soaraya Mouloudji, aneɣlaf n yimjahden d yimttalasen, Laid Rebiga, aneɣlaf n usemḍen d tesnaddadin, Hocine Cherhabuil, akked kra seg yimaslaḍen n tfekka tadiplumatit.
Tasehṛa-a d tin aydeg ay d-cnan kra seg tezlatin n Zulixa yettwassnen s tezlit-nnes mechuṛen n « Sob rachrach" d tezlatin ticawiyin niḍen, yernu tella-d tedyant-a d tajmilt i tgemmi tazzayrit tinizert.
S uẓawan n tuṛkist ddaw tmehla n uɣella Kamel Maati, mennaw n tnaẓurin ay yemseḍfaren akken ad d-cnun tizlatin n tnaẓurt-a, gar-asen Nadia Guerfi, Bariza, Radia Manal, Donia El Djazaïria akked Dalila Amel. Gar tezlatin ay d-cnant, tella "Rim El Achoua", "Yali Thabouna", "Essayad" akked "Ya Aïni Nouhi".
Deg tinawt-nnes, tenna-d tneɣlaft n yidles d tẓuriwin, Soaraya Mouloudji, dakken Zulixa « teggenses-d tigemmi tazzayrit tinizert n lejdud akken ay tuklal s ccna ay d-yecna tizlatin ticawiyin d tbedwiyin d wagam seg tgemmi n Aissa Djermouni d Hadda Beggar, yernu seg-s daɣ ay d-ugmen kra seg yismawen yettwassnen n uẓawan azzayri am Khelifi Ahmed, Nuṛa, Selwa d Deriassa ».

Deg umyager gar unabaḍ d yiwaliyen, yenna-d uselway Tebboune dakken asmurer s watigen n yifarisen n uzadur ttgen-t « yijenṭiḍen d yimennekcamen » ay yettarmen ad sfeclen awanak s useɣnew n lexṣaṣ, am wakken ay d-yerna dakken awanak yewwi-d addud d « aquran » deg temsalt-a yernu yegguccel « ad yesnes adabu-nnes ay d-yugem seg uɣref ».
Seg yidis niḍen, yenna-d uselway n tegduda dakken asaḍuf n tukci n tekfi n trebbawt ad yebdu ad yettwasnas deg ukatar n usaḍuf n tedrimt n 2022 i uḍman n ugemmir i yinerbiyen ilemẓiyen.
Ixebber-d daɣ dakken « ad ilin yiḍrisen imaynuten n usaḍuf i usebɣes n usefti d urẓam n yihriyen n teṛmisin ɣef leḥsab n yiketturen », am wakken ay d-yerna dakken uddun amakki n yismawen n yisenfaren n usnegmu deg ukatar n usefti anagdud d ayen ay d-ikecfen dakken « llan aṭas n yisenfaren yuglen niɣ werɛad ur ten-id-caren ara », am wakken ay d-iger tiɣri i uferru n ukaram-a uqbel tagara n useggas d uzraw n yisenfaren-a yiwen, yiwen.
Iger-d daɣ tiɣri i ubeḍḍu adeblan d amaynu i useɣnew n twilayin tinesmigalin d timaynutin deg Yignan Unnigen d ugafa n tmurt.

Deg useggas i yeɛdan issufeɣ-d umari Afrnansis, Anas Assanousi ungal-nnes amezwaru umi qqaren le règne des egos.
Assanousi, amara d aḥudri, netta ɛawed d akumidi. Ixleq di Nnaḍur, maca netta yeyma, yemɣer di Paris, tamedint n tsekla d tira. Ungal-a netta i yura issawar dag-s umari x imxumbal n ijjen tseḍma n umezgun. Maca di twalat d icten, ittɛeqqab-d dag-s ḥma ad aneɣ-yerr ɣar Arrif d tussna d umezruy-nnes.
Amara, issruɣa tifawin deg ungal n le règne des egos x ijjen uḥudri zi Paris. Maca netta zi Arrif, zi tiṭṭawin n uḥudri-ya nettwala Arrif d tussna-nnes. Yettwaḥsab adlis wa d amezwari n Assanoussi, i nessitim wer ittili ca d ameggaru. Mamec izemmer bnadem ad itter le règne des egos x Amazon. Aked uya, ad neydar ila din aṭṭas n imariten zi Arrif tteggen amkan-nnsen di tsekla Tawruppit. Ameknaw: Asis Aynan, Racida Lemrabeṭ, Najat Lhacmi d inneɣni.

r ad d-ilkem yisem n Waeraben isettuttin win Yibiẓanṭiyen. Nnarẓemen-d yismawen n Yifransisen d Yiṣbenyuliyen ẓmin isem n Waeraben allig mnennayen msasan ad mmefkan talwit Yef tadawt n yismawen yaḍnin.
Ferḥen yismawen imsasan iddeY ẓḍaren ad ẓmin yiwen yisem nn-ikkan ar ittemyak-kas aliY (fond) n wasif n Nil netta d win Yifarawnen. Isem-a ittuẓmin iga-t win Yilibi-yen neY ImaziYen. Isem-a inmala ad imyar tudert n uẓmay fellas izdin seg wakuden iqburen. Ttwagna Yefsen – ImaziYen- tbarda n umezruy

d tesfifin-nnsen asen-isettun i yimezdaY-a tamara n tezlatin-nnsen d wumum n ufrak-nnsen.

Dominik (s teglizit: Dominica, s tefṛansist: Dominique) d yiwet n tegzirt deg lebḥer n Karibi. Tezzin ɣer ugafa d ugafa-utram s Guadeloupe, ɣer unẓul-utram s Martinique. Tesea azal n 754 km² (291 sq mi), amḍiq ameqqran deg tmurt-a d Morne Diablotan s teɣzi n 1,447 m (4,747 ft). Agdud n Tdukli n Duminika d yiwweḍ i 72,500 n yimezdaɣ. Tamaneɣt-is d Roseau.
Tigzirt-a zdeɣen-tt irwaken i d-yusan seg Temrikt n Wenẓul deg lqern wis xemsa. Kalinago yekkes irawaken deg lqern wis 15. Nnan belli Columbus yiweḍ-d tegzirt-a ass n lḥedd, 3 wember 1493, imiren d Awarniyen i tt-yeṭṭfen, s waṭas seg 1690 ar 1763. ifransisen wwin-d iseklawen seg Tefriqt n Utaram ɣer Dominique bac ad xedmen deg tferkiwin n lqahwa. Tagellidt n briṭanya teṭṭef lḥekma deg useggas n 1763 deffir n ṭṭraḍ n sebea iseggasen, dɣa tesbedd tanglizit d tutlayt-is tunṣibt. Tigzirt-a tuɣal d tagduda deg useggas n 1978.

Tawilayt n Bumerdas
Tawilayt n Bumerdas d Tawilayt deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Zedɣen-tt 802 083 n yimezdaɣen. Ma d tajumma-ines tesɛa azal n 1 591 km². Tamanaɣt ines d tamdint n bumerdas. Tawilayt-a tebḍa ɣef 9 n tdayriwin:
- Tadayra n Leɛzib n Ccix (Leɛzib n Ccix, Sidi Dawed, Tawerga)
- Tadayra n Lburǧ n Yimnayen (Lburǧ n Yimnayen, Zemmuri, Ilegwaḍen, Taǧnant)
- Tadayra n Budwaw (Budwaw, Budwaw Lbeḥri, Lxerruba, Buzegza Qeddara, Wlad Heddaǧ)
- Tadayra n Bumerdas (Bumerdas, Qurṣu, Tijellabin)
- Tadayra n Delles (Delles, Aɛfir, Ben Ccud)
- Tadayra n Yesser (Ssi Mesṭafa, Yesser, Timeẓrit, Tacaɛbet)
- Tadayra n Lexmis n Lxecna (Lexmis n Lxecna, Wlad Musa, Lerbeɛṭac, Ḥemmadi)
- Tadayra n Leɛzib n Zeɛmum (Leɛzib n Zeɛmum, At Ɛisa)
- Tadayra n Tizi n At Ɛica (Tizi n At Ɛica, Suq Lḥad, Ammal, At Ɛemran)

Bumerdas
Bumerdas (s taɛrabt: بومرداس / s tifinaɣ: neɣ ⴱⵓⵎⴻⵔⴷⴰⵙ[2] / Rocher Noir[3] deg tasehrest taṛumit), d yiwet taɣiwant n tawilayt n Bumerdas, deg tadayṛa n Bumerdas, d nettat id adeg-aɣella, tella ar 45 km deg ugmuḍ n Zzayer dɣa ar 52 km deg umalu n Tizi Wezzu.
Di tama n Bumerdas, llant aṭas n tuddar anda urɛd ttemslayen s teqbaylit amazun tuddar n At Aɛmran, At Xelfun, Tijelabin.

Ayt Ksila
Ayt Ksila (Beni K'sila) d yiwet n temdint d tamecṭuḥt, tuzga-d deg lɣerb n Bgayet, teqreb ɣer yiri n yilel (lebḥeṛ), u teqreb diɣ ɣer Tuǧa. Tamdint-a zedɣen-tt azal n 4000 yimezdaɣen.
Ayt Ksila yekka-d yisem-is seg yisem n lɛeṛc neɣ tawsit ay izedɣen deg tama-nni. "Ayt Ksila" anamek-is "arraw n Ksila". Ay-a yebɣa ad d-yini dakk-n ajaddiw ay ɣef ttusemman wayt lɛeṛc-agi isem-is Ksila. Isem-agi yesmektay-aneɣ-d s "Kusayla" (Koceila), agellid-nni amaziɣ ay yennuɣen mgal Yinselmen asmi ay 
... (1603 chars skipped) ... 
k d wursu . Unuɣen iṛumaniyen am wigi nezmer ad ten-naf ula deg lateṛ ay d-ǧǧan Ṛ̣ṛuman deg Tuṛuft, maca ma nwala tugna n yilu (lfil) deg Tuṛuft n tallit n Ṛ̣ṛuman, ay-a ur yebɣi ara ad d-yini dakk-n ilu yella yettidir deg Tuṛuft, wanag aɣersiw-a yettidir kan u mazal-it yettidir deg Tefriqt d Asya (Lhend, Tayland, atg.).
Ihi, isem n Ksila ad yili yekka-d seg wawal "aksil", maca ur nezmir ad neqbel dakk-n "aksil"-a d isem n yiwen uɣersiw ay werǧin yedder deg Tmazɣa. Aɣersiw, mi ara yenger, ula d 
... (1603 chars skipped) ...
g lweqt ay deg "tigre" ur yesɛi ula d yiwen, nezmer ad neqbel ad d-nekkes yiwen seg yismawen-nni n yizem u "ad as-t-nefk" i uɣersiw-agi yettemcabin s izem (imi meqqer, yewɛeṛ, itett aksum u yetbeɛ ɣer twacult n yemcac). Ass-a, imi ay nefren ad as-nsemmi "aksil" i "tigre", ulac aɣilif, d acu kan, yessefk ad d-nini dakk-n deg laṣ̣el, "aksil" yella yesɛa anamek niḍen yernu isem n Ksila yekka-d seg wawal-nni aqdim yesɛan anamek aqdim.

RADIOSIWEL – Azul – Asadrar n Tlelli n Tmurt n Yeqvayliyen RadioSiwel d webradio n Tmurt n Yeqbayliyen. RadioSiweld ṛṛadyu n tlelli n wawal, d ṛṛadyu n tegmat gar Yeqbayliyen, d ṛṛadyu ɣef umennuɣ n wegdud aqbayli, d ṛṛadyu n umennuɣ n wegdud aqbayli i tmunent-is, i tutlayt-is. Di tallit-a i nettidir, agdud aqbayli, taqbaylit (Tutlayt d iseɣ) srant i wallalen-a atraren n umsawaḍ (webradio, webTV, applications) iwakken ad awḍen isallen d teɣṛi n Tmurt ar yal tama deg umaḍal. Iwakken ad awḍen isallen ɣef umennuɣ n Yeqbayliyen, ama di Tmurt ama di tamiwin nniḍen, iwakken ad nesseḥbiber ɣef TEQBAYLIT, iwakken ad nbeggen tikerkas d txiddas n icenga n weɣṛef aqbayli. S leqdic d tayri n imeɣnasen/ineɣmasen-nneɣ, di Tmurt, di Fṛansa, di Canada, di yal tama, awal, mebla takmamt, mebla tiggdi, mebla akukru, ad yili ɣef tsertit, tadamsa, idles, amezruy, addal, tawennaṭ, aẓawan d wayen akk icudden ɣer yiman d tidmi iqbayliyen. Ihi, akken i as-yeqqar Lwennas : « anda yella weqbayli, ad t-neqṣed, ad t-nesseḥḍer ».
