Ɛli sadqi Azayku, ikka tt nn iga yan umara d yan umdyaz aclḥiy asusiy. Ig yan umɣnas amaziɣ bahra mqqurn. Ilul ɣ usggʷass n 1942 ɣ tmazirt igan s wassaɣ Igran n twinkḥit ɣ idrarn n waṭlas ɣ trudant tasga n Sus ɣ tmazirt n Lmɣrib.
Ibda tiɣri nns amenzu ɣ tmazirt n Tafangult ikmalt ɣ Mrrakc, fadd ad ikcm s tinml tanamurt n islmadn. Yumẓ aslkin fad ad iddu ayg aslmad ɣ usinan n usmuttg ɣ Imi n Tanut (1962-1963, 1963-1964). Ɣ usgʷass n.ɣ 1968 Isskar turragt ɣ umezruy ɣ tsdawit n Rrbat. Amsadaɣ, usse
... (8 chars skipped) ... 
9 Ar 1970, Amaɣun (participe) d Aḥmed Bukus d Brahim Axiyyaṭ ɣ aɣawas n Annall isalmadn, idda s Bariz ar isskar tamsirdant (leçon) n tmaziɣt ɣ tinml n INALCO, lbda assujd ituragt n Jaques Berques. Ɣ usggwas n 1967, Ɛli sadqi Azayku, Imdra ɣ Tugi n tamsmunt Tamaziɣt ɣ Lmeṛṛuk. Izzuyd dars imzzan ɣ usgʷass1973/1975 igasn assaɣn imaziɣen iqqburn Tillila d Ziri.

... (8 chars skipped) ...
aziɣt, Ɛli sadqi Azayku immut ɣ 10 Cutanbir ɣ tmdint n Rrbat 2004 Itumdal ɣ tmazirt nns Igran.

Taḥeccact n tuga di taddart
D tagara n maggu, akken kan fɣen yiwwraɣen, kecmen iquranen. D tallit n teḥcact n usaɣur. Lɣaci refden ilewwacen (imegran uṛumi), ffɣen ɣer yigran ad ḥuccen. Xas akken mačči am zik-nni i tella tḥeccact, maca mazal ciṭuḥ n tiẓeḍṭ deg-s, tiẓeḍt n twizi. Lɣaci mazal-iten ttazalen deffir n yixeclawen n tuga, ad heggin aɛwin i lmal-nsen deg wussan n tegrest deg-i d-ɣellin ideflawen. Uqbel ad d-yeffeɣ yiṭij, lɣaci ad
... (484 chars skipped) ... 
 tmest. Tirni n tenzayt d azgen n uxeddim. Гef waya aḥeccac, ilaq ad ilḥeq ṣbeḥ zik s ajeṛṛaf, uqbel ad d-yali yiṭij akken ur yesserɣay ara tafekka-s, ilaq ad yerr lemḍella ɣef uqerruy-is neɣ xerṣum ad t-yesbur s ubeḥnuq akken iwata akken ur tettḥazan ara iziran n tafukt. Mi qqimen ad rrẓen tanalt, yal wa d ayen iḥemmel ad t-yečč, yattawi-t. Wa d ayefki yewwan s tẓidanin, wa d aɣrum uḍajin s yiɣi, wa d tazart d zzit, lbaṭaṭa tuftit, timellalin tuftiyin, tarkect n yifelfel d ṭumaṭic… Iḥeccacen tt
... (484 chars skipped) ...
nt asennan, afeḥyayuz, aɛeqquq n yiɣri, aɣeddu n umcic. Akken alamma d azal, ad kecmen s ixxamen-nsen, ad ččen imekli, ad sganfun alamma d azuzwu. Tirni n tmeddit d tawezlant, d aɛeddi kan. Ha ! yeɣli yiṭij, xas ulamma ussan d iɣezfanen, tirni meẓẓiyet. Mi kfan taḥeccact, ad rjun kra n wussan ar d-yeqqar usaɣur-nni, syinna akin, ad t-jemɛen d iɛemmuren, am taffa n yirden. Ad rjun tamacint ad t-cudden. Yal win icudden tuga-ines, ad tt-yawi ad tt-yaxzen, dayen ifuk leɛtab n tuga.
Fahim Messaoudène

Tikli n wegdud ɣer yiswi n tlelli. D iseggasen tura, yal tikelt nettmektay-d amennuɣ-agi yellan d aẓeṭṭa n umezruy. Si lǧil ɣer wayeḍ iteddu wawal yettfutki.

MESTƔANEM – Tasemhuyt n usnebdu n useggas-a deg Mestɣanem tettwaɣ ɣef lǧal n uzraɛ n unfafad bu uqacuc d umdal n teftisin, iɣsuren imerranen d yisensa, tallunin n umzel d tneggiwin n usikel seg wayyur n Meɣres yezrin.
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Yesḥassef unebdammas n tegduda, Karim Younes, ɣef wamek ay d-yerra uwali n Mestɣanem i yiwet n tɣermant ay as-yessutren ad tt-yalel akken ad tesselhu tagnit-nnes tanmettit, am wakken ad d-yerna dakken ta d tigawt yuklalen asiẓer imi ay teffeɣ i ubrid n lewṣayat n uselway n tegduda.
MESTƔANEM – Afrag n umzel d yiɣersiwen n « Mosta Land » n Mestɣanem yewwi-d, seg melmi kan, isekniyen n usmaɣ aydeg ad ssersen deg-sen irran n Tefriqt d yiksilen n Bengal, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna tmehla n ufrag-a ass n ukwas (lexmis).
MESTƔANEM – Ufan-d yiwen n uẓekka d yiceqfan n ufexxar n tallit tamezruyant taqburt deg twilayt n Mestɣanem, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna, ass n ukras (laṛebɛa), tmehla n yidles n twilayt-a.
MESTƔANEM – Teqqel twilayt n Mestɣanem, deg 2018, d asfaylu amerran d zzhu ifazen s yisensa-nnes n tɣara tunnigt ay ireẓmen seg melmi kan d usmal n temnaḍt-a akken ad teqqel d taɣerwaḍt tamerrant.
MESTƔANEM – Ssaggzen asmel amezruyan n « Yifri n Fracic” deg wumuɣ n wayla adelsan n twilayt n Mestɣanem, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna tmehla n yidlis ass n usinas (ttlata).

Kksen yakan lḥerma Yef Imasiḥiyen, di teacurt-nni yezrin, usan-d gdelen fell-asen akeccum ar tẓalit-nsen, mi d-usan tikkelt-nni tamezwarut, i d-yenna Mass Krirec, neereḍ ad nemsefham nekkni yid-sen, maca nutni euẓgen akk Yef wayen i d-neqqar, eemmden ad tili ttberna neY abaraz wala ad yili lğamee Imasiḥiyen, imir neccetka ar temsulta nYil d taYlist ad tesseḥbiber cwiṭ fell-aY,ziYen eedzen-as neY ur d-cliggen ara deg-nneY, acku deg wass-nni taluft teqqim kan akken tesbek. D imedlusen-nni n ddin i d-yusan i tikkelt tis-snat serYen akk ayen yellan deg-s, nuYal ar imsulta usan-d ẓran tawaYit yeḍran, uran-tt d cikkaya, awal n Mass Krirec imḍebber n ligiz tafat: Γas serYen lğamee-a ideg nettẓala, ur ttizmiren ara aY-sinfen i webrid-nneY, imi ul yeččur s laman akked tayri, nesea ixxamen-nneY, a ten-nerr d leğwamee ad nẓal deg-sen, ar d-tili tlelli n wesYan.

Ass-a n ssevt 03 di meɣres 2018, ɣef lewhi 11:00, tasmidegt (coordination) n MAK-Anavad n usamer i yellan ɣef uqerru-yis Massyl Megatti d Nadir Celbabi, temlal d imeɣnasen n tɣiwant n Fereun i d-yezgan deg ugezdu n Vgayet deg yiwet temlilit-askasi (rencontre-débat) gar imeɣnasen.
Awal yevda-t-id Nadir Celbabi ɣef umecwar i d-yelḥa umussu n MAK d tsertit i d-yewwi deg yiseggasen-is imezwura, almi d ass-a. Syin yemeslay-d Massyl Meggati, s yisem-is d aselway n tesmidegt ɣef umahel n Unavad aqvayli ueḍil -GPK deg wasmi i d-ilul deg useggas 2010.
Ihi, yewwi-d awal ɣef leqdic akk yetwaxdamen d umaktay (le mémorandum) i yessers deg ONU ass n 28 di ctember, d wazal yesea deg umennuɣ ɣef afraniman i tmurt taqvaylit. Γer taggara Massyl Meggati ifuk awal-is s yiwet n tiɣri i yimeɣnasen iḥeḍren, ad ilin seg wid ara yennaɣen s talwit d tezdeg akk d tikli yelhan.
Deg uskasi (débat), awal yuɣal-d I yemeɣnasen deg yal aḥric, am akken i d-tella tririt si tama Nadir Celbabi ak d Massyl Meggatli.
Γer taggara n temlilit n wass-a, yella-d usveddi n tesqamut n MAK-Anavad n Fereun s yimeɣnasen ara yilin deg wannar, d wid daɣen ara d yernun iseɣ i umussu i tikli ɣer zdat.
Ieeggalen n usqamu :
Γer tselwit (présidence) : Abed N. A., ameiwen-is : Lyas B.
Γer tuddsa (organique): Fawzi A., ameiwen-is / Nadjim B.
Γer teɣwalt (communication): Fatah B.

Wid ara yesqedcen aseɣwen n « Hofad Amana » ad ssiggzen iman-nsen akken ad derwen deg usegrer n tefranin tisentanin n 12 Yunyu ay d-yetteddun deg yiwet seg tnariyin neɣ ammasen n udɣar ara yettwareẓmen i lmend n tedyan-a. Iswi n usiggez-a s Internet d aḍman n tiffrawent deg temsalt n usuddes n tefranin-a.
Aɣerman ara yadfen ɣer usmel aliktṛunan n Udabu Aɣelnaw Amzarug n Tefranin yezmer ad yessiggez iman-nnes deg tɣerɣert n « Hofad Amana » s usidef n telɣa-nnes deg tuzunin ay d-yettwaheyyan i waya. Mi ara yettwaqbel, ad t-id-yaweḍ ungal udmawan ara t-yeǧǧen ad imahel d amsigg deg tnarit neɣ ammas n udɣar iqerben ɣer wanda ay yezdeɣ.
Tamzelt-a ad tfak ass n 7 Mayu ay d-yetteddun. Umuɣ n yimsiggen yettwafernen deg tmurt akken ma tella ad t-id-yesnuged Udabu Aɣelnaw Amzarug n Tefranin.
Deg tefranin tiselwayanin n 2019, Adabu Aɣelnaw Amzarug iheyya-d azadur n yisefka ay t-yeǧǧan ad d-iheyyi afaylu aɣelnaw aliktṛunan n tfekka tafranant.

Abu Lḥasan
Abu Lḥasan d taɣiwant n Cclef, zedɣen-tt 20.164 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist, llan ɣɣaren-as Cavaignac.
Aẓar n wawal[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Asmi ay tuwey Ldzayer azarug, semman-as Abu Lḥasan, akken ad rren tajmilt i yiwen n wemjahed ɣɣaren-as Abu Lḥasan (isem-nnes n tidet d Ɛebdelqader Lbaqi, ilul deg tama n Remci, deg Tlemsan).
Amezruy[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Deg 11 Nwember 1992, taɣiwant n Abu Lḥasan iḥuza-tt uḥemmal d ameqran. Taɣiwant-a tenḍerr mliḥ deg tallit n ccwal ay inekren deg tmurt n Ldzayer gar 1992 ed 2002, maca seg 1999 ar ass-a, yebda tebda tetteqqal-d talwit ɣer tɣiwant-a cwiṭ, cwiṭ.

Gar temnaḍin-a, ad d-nebder taɣiwant n At Mlikec, i d-yezgan deg wasun n Tezmalt, tawilayt n Bgayet. Ulac akkin neɣ akka ! Ass-a d wid/tid akk illan deffir ifergan n leḥbas, cudden di yal tama n tmurt (Lezzayer, Tlemcen, Setif, Ouargla, Kolea, Tizi Wezzu, Bgayet, atg…) i igan azal i wayen yesdukulen tamurt ɣef tidet akked izerfan, mačči d ayen swayes yettmeddiḥ néo-FLN akked ibandiyen-is si 1962.
Aseqdec n teɣdemt akken ad sbibben ayen ur nelli i tarwa n tmurt (takriṭ/violence, tarebrabt, beṭṭu n tmurt, atg…), simmal itezzi-d zun d boomerang ɣef teɣdemt-nni i yellan ass-a d amezrag gar ifassen 
... (422 chars skipped) ... 
en idrimen n tmurt (détournement des subventions) i yettallen isufar n wučči (smid, lfarina, zzit…), ttawin akal akked tnezduɣin di yal amkan s imeddukal-nsen illan di twilayin n tmurt, ass-a ṭṭfen tasawent, heddren tafenṭazit.
I tiṭ n uɣref, d nitni i d udem n udabu amaynut !
Wid iḥercen deg-sen ugar, xemten, heggan iman-nsen akken ad ččen aftat ameqqran d-iteddun : les concessions de distributions automobiles !
Adabu n wass-a, ur izmir ad iqqim di tnemmast. D tamara fell-as, ad ibedd ɣef izerf
... (422 chars skipped) ...
bar ur nekcim annar n tekriṭ akked trebrabt : d amnistie générale !
D asurif amezwaru ara yernun ccan i tmurt n Lezzayer, tin izemlen yakan yal asaḍuf n izerfan n ugraw n ONU.
Ad yili d abrid i tsertit tamaynut ara yekksen asaḍuf 87 bis akked tecrurin nniḍen i yellan zun d ineccaben nnig iqerra n Izzayriyen.
Ma yeqqim udabu deg ubrid n wass-a, ad iqabel azekka iḥemmalen ur issin, acku « tella talast deg iẓemmi n yal agdud» / «il y a toujours une limite de compression populaire »).
Aumer U Lamara

Deg yiwet n tinawt ay d-yenna i lmend n Tseqqimt Tamnaḍant Tafriqit Tis 63 ay tessuddes Tuddsa Tanmaḍalt n Tmerrit s usarag n teẓrit, yenna-d Mass Mermouri dakken iduba inagduden ddmen tamasit-nsen deg wayen yerzan imsemhal d yimsaduren yernu ad ten-yesmuni i lmend n usduqqes n urmud adamsan. I lmend n waya, ad asen-yessifses tamsalt deg wayen yerzan tiwsi d uḥraz n yimahalen-nsen.
Deg wayen yerzan tasemhuyt n usnebdu n 2020, iwekked-d uneɣlaf dakken tasemhuyt-a teqqen ɣer tukksa n usekmen yernu atni ssewjaden-as-d s usemyuddes d wakk idisan ay terza temsalt, ladɣa aɣlif n ugensu.
Seg yidis niḍen, yenna-d Mass Mermouri dakken amyager-a aydeg ttekkan yineɣlafen n tmerrit n tmura yemgerraden n Tefriqit d tagnit i wallus n uwekked ɣef usejhed n usemyuddes d unmireg gar tmura tifriqiyin deg unrar n tmerrit s umsenfal n termitin d terza gar yimerrayen n umenẓaw, asebɣes n ticcurka gar ugzum anagdud d wuslig d uttekki deg usnegmu n tdumṣikin.
Yella-d daɣ uwekked ɣef usileɣ, asmal n tissnulfa d uselhu n tenḍi ayyes yettwassen umur ameqran seg tmura tifriqiyin.

Tenna tamawst n usegmi anamur di Nnaḍur ila iggur ad sbedden tɣuri di Tlata n tmezgidawin. Zeg wass n larbeɛ 30 ɣuct, ar ɣa ɛdan 14 n wussan. Manaya di tnayen n temzgidawin n tɣuri n ttmenyat d ijjen lkulij nniḍen. Iggur ad fesren x wass i di ɣa dewlen ad ɣren di simana-ya tanita.
Tenna tamehla n usegmi di Nnaḍur, ila tamezgida n Rrisala 2 d Lmada ufin kuruna di tnayen n tmeḥḍarin d ict tselmadt. Di min iqqnen ɣer Lkulij n Ṭariq Ben Ziyad, ufin Kuruna deg ijjen tselmadt. Xenni di Lkulij-a wa ggin dag-s aselmed s lagg°aj.
Ittas-d manaya, d Lmuɣrib ɛad ittzemmam kul twalat aṭṭas n nnumrawat s imehlak n Kuruna. Mani wer d-ittbin ca ila di ladas zemmren ad qḍan x lehlak-a. Γir mala tettwaf ca n bakuna di ladas.

Jastinyan Amzwaru
Jastinyan Amzwaru (s tlatinit: Flavyus Pitrus Sabbatyus lustinyanus Awgustus, s tgrikt: ΦλάBιoς Πέtpoς EaBBάtιoς Ἰouσtιvιavός) ( 482 – 14 novembre 565), ittyawssan dar umata s Jastinyan Axatar, ikka-t-inn iga Imbraṭur Aṛumi n Bizanṭa zɣ 527 ar tamttant nns.
Ittyawssan s mas d nttan ad isgaddan inigl anzzarfu igan s yism azrf n Jastinyan ɣ ammas n tsqqimt n Tribunyan, (expansion) aɛskri n tgldit ɣ uzmz nns d littihal d tamunt nns d Tyudra tagllidt. Ittyawssan daɣ s yism n "Imbraṭur Aṛumi Anggaru". Yurm Jastinyan ɣ wussan-nns ad issurri addur n tmbraṭuriyt taṛumit. Imasiḥiyn Irtuduksiyin n unẓul, ar t-ttggan d agʷrram.
Isggʷasn imzwura ɣ tnbbaḍt n Jastinyan (527-532)[ssnfl | Snfl asagm]
Lliɣ yumẓ Jastinyan tanbbaḍt, tambraṭuriyt ɣ akud ann, ur ta jju tfukka tassasin nns mqqurnin; tilli ɣ nn tḍr tigira n tasut tis smmust. Acku, ɣ yirn gguranin n tnbbaḍt n Jastinyan, usin daɣ Ifarisiyn acnyal n lgirra mgal tambraṭuriyt, yuɣul s ɣmkad amur imqqurn ɣ tsrdast tabizanṭit ur isala yat abla icabukn ann n unẓul (iffus), ima ɣ ugns n tgldit, trwi tizi ɣ ammas n Qusṭanṭiniya

Urlyus Ugestinus
Ugustan n hipun niɣd s talatinit (Aurelius Augustinus ) niɣd s tafransist (Saint Augustin ). Iga yan ɣ ifulusfn imaziɣ iɣatarn. ilul ɣ tama n taɣast ɣ tamzɣa (ɣil suq ahras ɣ tamurt n Dzyr) as n 13 novembre 354 s asggas amaziɣ as nwis 31 ktubr 1304 ittumḍal ɣ 28 ɣuct 430 ɣ Hipun (ɣil Eannaba ɣ Dzayr). Ayt dars gan kullu imaziɣn mac ar ttinin masd ibbas itfr irumiyn niɣd (Afrikkic arumi), innas uhu (Tafrikkict ilillin). Ar ittara s talati nit ig yan ɣ Kkuẓ iɣatarn n tmzgida Tarumit ɣ ussan ns imzwura. Iɣatarn ad lli igan Agrram arumi s tafransist (Saint ) Ugustan, Agrram Umbrwas , Agrram Jirum s tafransist (Saint Jérôme ), Agrram Grigwar amzwaru s tafransist (Grégoire Ier ) d 33 ṭalb n tmzgida tarumit. Ikatulikiyn ar bdda skarn tafuɣla n tamṭṭalt ns graygat as n 28 ɣuct (15 ɣuct amaziɣ). Ait uɣtuduks nttnin aras skar n tafuɣla as n 15 yulyu (2 ɣuct amaziɣ).

Yella-d waya deg umyager ay d-yellan ass n uynas gar Mass Lamamra d tnebgit-nnes tabusnit, Massa Bisera Turkovic, ay d-yerzan ɣef Zzayer deg yiwen n udiwenni udem ɣer wudem aydeg derwent tmagliwin n snat-a n tmura yernu yella-d wawal gar-asen ɣef tammidwa icerken snat-a n tmura d tukci n wazal i tgemmi tadelsant d talsant ay icerken iɣerfan azzayri d ubusni.
Cekṛen-d sin-a n yineɣlafen aɣtas n yiduba n snat-an n tmura akken ad sdusen agenses adiplumati gar Zzayer d Sarajevo s urẓam n tmuzal yernu ḥetteten-d ɣef tixxutert n umahil i usmal n unmireg asindisan, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan idis aɣedman, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna ulɣu-a.
I lmend n waya, ssawlen-d sin-a n yidisan daɣ ɣef unmireg asertan d uɣellisan ama deg uswir amnaḍan, ama deg uswir agraɣlan, yernu wekkden-d ɣef wanaḍ n usugget n umciweṛ d usemyuddes gar snat-a n tmura deg wayen yerzan timsal n tnafut tucrikt.

Acḥal aya tura, d tamurt n leqbayel i d-yettazgen deg umekkan amezwaru deg yikayaden n yal aswir n leqraya deg tmurt n lezzayer. Yeṭṭuqqet wawal, sya u sya, ɣef wamek i tewwi lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu amḍiq amezwaru. Gar tismin akked leḥsed, mačči d kra i d-yennulfan, mačči d izli i ɛerḍen yimdanen n lwilayat-nniḍen, ad cemten lwilaya-agi. Netta, limmer i d ak-terbiḥ ay ul, tili ad walin u ad iḥfiḍen ɣur-s. Ad steqsin ɣef lesrar i tt-yeǧǧan ad teṭṭef taqacucut-a, mačči d tiyata ara kkaten deg-s. Aya, 
... (196 chars skipped) ... 
ara yeqqar. Tadrimt n tyemmatin, tettruḥu deg leqraya n warraw-nsent mačči deg ddheb neɣ deg lḥemmamat. Ɣer yinelmaden iqbayliyen, tarumit akked teglizit d tutlayin n tussna mačči d tutlayin n lkuffar. Akken qqaren ‘’Ɛezrayen s taɛrabt ara aɣ-d-yemmeslay asmi ara nemmet’’. Ɣer yinelmaden iqbayliyen, taɛrabt am tmaziɣt : yiwet nsen, tayeḍ ahat ad tt-ḥwiǧen. Ur uɣen ara awal i Mokri imi i as-yenna ‘’ilaq ur tettili ara tmaziɣt akked trumit deg uɣerbaz azzayri’’. Mi ara sɣaren yiselmaden inelmaden 
... (196 chars skipped) ...
tamezwarut deg lwilaya), wiyaḍ ad tafeḍ ‘’Incallah d maca allah’’ gar yicenfiren-nsen. Mi ara tili tanga (matière), ɣer wiyaḍ, ‘’Muqaddasa’’ , ɣer yinelmaden iqbayliyen, ttwalin kan coefficient-nni i tesɛa. Mi ara tafeḍ tisqemmu akked tdukliwin n tudrin n leqbayel heggant-d iselmaden i wat taddart-nsen seg lmeɣreb alamma d lɛica , wiyaḍ qqaren-as ‘’baɛda lɛica, ifɛel ma taca’’. Anect-a akk, yerna leqbayel kerhen aɣerbaz imi yeḥfa, ihi lukan ad yemsed wissen d acu ara yeḍrun !? Twalaḍ !

I teskala n ʷaswingem/ Tesakla n lxalet..
Amaxluq d’un yeḥlan.. Imeddeb.. Azgen n temadduret.. Aṛaḥ d temedduret tejmel.. Udem-in n ucahhel.. N lebha.. I tizdeg.. Temamet d tewmet.. D temaddukelt.. D teḥbibet.. Nettet d amzir amuqṛan ag yettakran ḍḍeṛ-nneɣ u nečni ur nessin at d afuwweḥ n temuret teḥṛuṛet.. Ad yettawin ɣir aɣammey inaffeen.. Sin kkul ʷartuc temaṭṭut tesarɣnit ɣers titufutin yeyyiḍ bxaṣṣek “Temaṭṭut tecankalit”.. Temaṭṭut-ey ddemit d tezmeret n ʷul d ʷawal n zzlizi.. Tbedd abeddit n ʷargez id n ʷargez acenkali.. Di ukk n timsalin n temadduret gi tekarrazet.. Tuẓẓut.. Asalmed.. Dddddd.. Aeengeṛ n ʷadrer d ufawweḥ n ujeǧik.. Ak d rriḥet n ukaṛḍuṣ d usuneɣ n ucel.. D tiɣawsiwin at-yeǧin tbedd g udem n lwaeṛan n temadduret..
Twalef s ʷanduṛṛi.. Twalef hesmaṛquṣ f tefadnin n ʷakud.. Teẓd-as aṛuḍ n ucucṭ-nnes.. Si lexyalet-nnes teṣka turjayin d timallalin.. Tella hetxaṭwi jer n y-iḍ d ʷass u nettet ud-hewwi laxbeṛ at lmaktub ad yessens fell-as tefawet ass..
Turi i tiblidin n tefuket isakkilen-nnes.. Amek turi f ucuceṭ n timizer.. D lkaṛf n ʷaɣlan..
Lamkenti iḍ seg iḍan hetwaker di liman-nnes d tucta-nnes di temadduret.. Hettumerreɣ g uxanfuf-nnes s ifassen nazsen.. Cṛa-n lwaqt ifuḥ yetnuḥ..!
Yensa ukanki n turna n tegurit-nnes i ʷabrid.. Asirem di-s yemmut ass n 03 ɣuct.. Ass n leeza amuqṛan..!

Tkkes Google asadel Yef usenfar n uzeṭṭa-nnes ametti. Ukan, nYiy anini yuwen uzeṭṭa g tizri tamettit. Aya yaYul s ku yuwen umzemmizzel n Google iYiy ad idYer Yef
Awey-at itnan, yuwen ummucceḍ ur iḥlin n Firefox da itettey g Internet ar d-itekka Google Images. Aya izward g kigan n tewlafin ittumdin nna ileqqef umesadday n tirzi

Diana
Diana Spencer, tageldunt n Yigaliyen tlul-d ass n g Sandringham g Legliz tejweǧ d ugeldun Carl Windsor ass n tebra-yas g useggas n 1996, temmut ass n 31 ɣuct 1997 s ddaw tileggit n Alma g temdint n Paris akk d umdakkel-is ameṣri Dudi Alfayed.
Twasen s yisem n Lady Di neɣ Lady Diana, tiffefeɣt tella tqaras tageldunt Diana maca awal-agi mači n tides axaṭer neqqar issem n tgeldunt i tageldunt n idammen.
Tella daɣen tettwasen f cɣal-is n lxir d wayen yelhan i ugellilen d imuḍan. Seg wass ass mi twaxḍeb d ugeldun Carl Windsor n lGal g useggas n 1981 armi temmut g useggas n 1997 sddaw n tileggit n l’Alma g Pari s laksida n tkarrust, Diana, tella tameṭṭut gar tullas timsunin g ddunit , d tin i thibi yal agdud, akter tagellidt Elizabet II

ISWI ED YERMUDEN
Tiddukla IMEDYAZEN d tiddukla tadelsant iqeddcen i wakken ad tidir tutlayt TAMAZIƔT, ad tt-mmeslayen warraw-nnes, ad tt-arun, ad yes-s zuxen ur as-teggen takna. Iswi n tiddukla d asebɣes n useqdec n Tmaziɣt deg yal d anrar ed tririt n ccan i temkant ay tla d azref. IMEDYAZEN d tiddukla iqeddcen deg wenrar adelsan ed ussnan s yermuden n uselmed n tutlayt, s usufe...ɣ n yedlisen, s useqdec-nnes deg internet ed yermuden akk ay deg yella useqdec n tutlayt. IMEDYAZEN d tiddukla yexḍa
... (455 chars skipped) ... 
en d yiwen wegdud ur d igduden yemfaṣalen, idles Amaziɣ d yiwen, yesdukel akk Imaziɣen. D wa akk ay d amenzay-nnes amezwaru.
TINESLEMT :Tiddukla IMEDYAZEN d tiddukla yettamnen ed yettqadaren ddin Ineslem. Ur tettnadi ad tekkes i yiwen ad yamen s wayen yebɣa maca ur tqebbel ara ad tettwaweḍ deg Timmuzɣa-is neɣ ad tettwargam imi kan d Tineslemt. Tessebɣas tiddukla azalen iweqmen ay yis d-yegla ddin maca tberra deg usexdem n Tineslemt i useɛṛeb ed yeswiyen isertiyen.
TADZAYRIT : Amenzay wis kṛad ay
... (455 chars skipped) ...
ger yegduden, n tussna ed tmussni ed wazalen akk yesnernayen amdan. Tiddukla tettemyallal ed kra n win neɣ tin ara tt-iqadren s yimenzayen-nnes deg wayen akk ara yesnernin Tamaziɣt, ara yesnernin Timmuzɣa.
ANṢUF YIS-WEN
Wa d adeg-nnes ay deg ara tafem ayen d-tessewjad tiddukla d allalen n uselmed n Tmaziɣt, d imagraden, d tizrawin ed yisallen akk izemren ad nefɛen wid yesseqdacen Tamaziɣt ed wid yekkaten fell-as. Nessarem ad deg-s tafem xersum kra seg wayen tettnadim.

Ussan-a ineggura anfafaḍ n CoYid-19 d win d-yuɣalen s lǧehd deg ukkuẓ n tɣemmaṛ n Tmurt Taqbaylit, sbiṭarat n tmurt yekfa deg-sen uksijin, imuṭan ṭupṛen ulamek nefsen, yal tama d imeṭṭi, ttmettaten yemdanen yal-ass. Ddaw n uɣilif-a i d-yeɣlin ɣef wegdud, aṭas n wudmawen yetwasnen d tuddsiwin yellan deg Tmurt Taqbaylit ssawlen-d akken ad yili unegzum n tikliwin n wass n lǧemɛa deg Tmurt.
Ass-a n lexmis 22 yulyu 2021, imastanen yellan d iɛeggalen n wegraw yekkatenɣef izerfan n imeḥbas n tikti n Tizi-Wezzu, sawlen-d deg yiwen wulɣu anda ssutren deg yimezdaɣ n Tmurt Taqbaylit ad gezmen tikliwin-a n wass n lǧemɛa akken ad sseḥbibren ɣef tezmert n weɣref.
Akken d-nura yakan deg tesɣunt-nneɣ, yir liḥala deg tella tezmert deg Tmurt Taqbaylit, tesra ad xemmlen imezdaɣ i yifassen-nsen, ad d-rren tuddsa-nni gan deg tazwara n wenfafad-a n coYid-19, s unegzum yak n usegrew n medden, d uheggi n iḥebbasen deg yal anekcum n taddert d izenqan n teɣremt. Azekka ad nwali ma agdud d win ifernen tudert neɣ d win umi dreɣlent wallen.

Par DDK | 10 Septembre 2018 | 479 lecture(s)
Tizi Uzzu Timsizelt n ddabex uḍar gar tudrin
Tuɣal-d teqbuct i terbaɛt n taddart n At Zɛim
Deg wass-n n ssebt iɛeddan, amenzu n cutember 2018 ɣef 16h , i d-tella temlil-it n telɣuɣa n ddabex n uḍar gar tudrin, i d-tesuddes tɣiwant n Tirmitin n Buɣni, anda urarent snat n trebuyaɛ yewwḍen ɣer uḥric aneggaru, tarbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n taddart n At Zɛim d yilmeẓyen n taddart n Tirmitin n Buɣni. Snat n trebuyaɛ, urarent deg unnar n Qantijja, anda ḥeḍren aṭas n yimfarğen seg snat n tudrin, srabes laman d yimḍebren n snat n tɣiwanin uɣur tabaɛent tudrin-agi. Tedda temlilit akken iwata, dɣa deg 90 n dqiqa n wurar, snat n trebuyaɛ-a, beggnent-d iman-nsent. Nudant yakk akken ad d-awint iswiyen, maca ur sawḍent ara, ɣas ma aṭas tyitiwin igerzen i d-yellan seg snat n trebuyaɛ. Akud n temlilit n usaḍef yekfa, anefray n temlilit yerna akud n zyada 30 n dqiqa, maca dima ulac iswiyen. Syin, tewweḍ temlilit ɣer tyitiwin n uḍar, anda i d-yuɣal wafud i tarbaɛt n taddart n At Zɛim, i d-yewwin taqbuct-agi. Imezdaɣ n taddart n At Zɛim d yimezdaɣ n tudrin i as-d-yezzin, ferḥen nezzel s teqbuct-agi, anda d-heggan yiwet n tmeɣra meqqren i yimyuraren d usleɣmay. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken timsizelt-agi n ddabax n uḍar, tebda deg umenzu n waggur n ɣuct iɛeddan, tsuddes-id tɣiwant n Tirmitin n Buɣni, anda ttekkant 16 n trebuyaɛ n tudrin n unẓul n temdint n Tizi-Uzzu.
Ali Zalouk

La texsed ad tesnqed zi seḥḥet-nnec, texsed ad tegged arryaḍa, texsed ad tecced ca n macca tneffeɛ niɣ trezzud ad tenḍared ddexxan?. Marra imezran-a wer nzemmer ad ɣer-sen naweḍ ɣir mala nekkes ca n leɛwayed d tiɛeffanin nettegg-itent. Wer daneɣ-ttejjin ca ad tent-negg. Waxxa tili neccin nxes zeɛma ad yili ubeddel di tudert-nneɣ.
Mala trezzud ad tekksed leɛwayed-nnec/m tiɛeffanin manaya axmi ttɛawaded tettprugramid adji ḥuma ad txelqed leɛwayed-nniḍen d tisebḥanin ad d-asent aked min trezzud cek
... (533 chars skipped) ... 
ggeɣ ammu ? » Manaya d ac-iwwec ijjen tmuɣri d tmiriwet x umsurruf-nnec.
Wis tnayen : Ma manaya yecna niɣ wer yeḥḥli ? Awerni xmi ɣa neḥḍa ixef-nneɣ, ixess-aɣ a nessen ma min nettegg d asebḥan niɣ d aɛeffan ? Ma amsurruf-nneɣ i nettegg lexxu ad aneɣ-iɛawen a naweḍ ɣer mayen nxes ma lla?.
Wis tlata : Ḍfer leɛwayed nniḍen : Ass i di ɣa nsettef mamec ggint leɛwayed-nneɣ, ixess-aneɣ ad nsaqar leɛwayed nniḍen maḥend a nrebba nnefs-nneɣ, tameslayt-a tanita tettetter cwayt n jjehd. Focus Ijjen usit d a
... (533 chars skipped) ...
nneɣ, aya ad yejj adji ḥuma ad ismqudda tudert-nneɣ mamec i tt-ttuɣa aked mamec tedwel.
Waxxa abeddel n ɛada taɛeffant itteḥwaja cwayt n lweqt d tazemmar. Maca ad ɣer-s tawḍed. Alaḥsab tasdawit n « University College London » aya izemmer ad yaweḍ ar settin n wussan ḥuma ad tegged ijjen arrutin d amaynu. S uya jj-icek zi qil uqal mala txesed ad tenḍared ddexxan, ad tsneqsed zi seḥḥet-nnec niɣ ad tegged ca n arrijim, ɛewwel x-as, ad tewḍed ad tawḍed.

Boualem Yekker ilehhu deg webrid s tkerrust. Cwit acema, hebsen-t tikli tkerrusin. Qwant gher deffir, qwant gher sdat. Ur yezri d acu I yedran. Yeffegh-d di tkerrust, yesteqsa kra n yimdanen maca yufa-ten ttmeslayen ghef isental nniden yecban zzit, aksum, timeghriwin…
Ikemmel gher sdat, yufa yiwen uttarus yettes di lehna deg webrid, qrib it yerked. Ur d yewwi s isali tedder negh tenger. Boualem Yekker yessarem ad yilli am weqjun-nni akken ur yetthulfu ara i wuguren n tudert. Ikemmel gher sdat, i
... (376 chars skipped) ... 
 s lgehd s lbunya gher uqerruy, yesnezfit.
Imi id yukki, yufa-d iman-is yettwarez deg udrar. Yebgha ad yekker, ur yezmir ara. Idaren-is, ifasen-is, ttwarzen. Cudden-t gher lgedra n yiwen useklu s wemrar d azuran. Yeqqim, ihar d acu ara yexdem. Ur yezri ma ilaq axir ad issugh negh ad yessusem.
Iruh-d yiwen ueessas s ubeckid, s tlaba n Afghanistan, yegzem amrar it icuden s lmus, yewwi-t gher ugellid-nsen i yellan daxel uqidun. Boualem Yekker yettargigi am usaflaw maca ur yezri ma deg usemmid negh 
... (376 chars skipped) ...
kat-it s rkulat war rrehma, yerna-as rregmat. Boualem Yekker yecca times s wurfan. Yenna deg wul-is: “D nekk id yurwen awaghezniw-agi I yekksen sser d leqder ghef talsa. D nekk ig laqen ad selkegh amadal s lfuha-agi is-iyi-d yerjem ccitan ad t-yexzu Rebbi.”
Yeddem-d yiwen ubeckid i yegga bab-is dina, yesmar-as akk ayen yesea d rressas. Yexbabed di lqaea armi yemmut. Boualem Yekker yehulfa i yiman-is d afessas, yeqqed ul-is.

TANUMI g Tiṭṭawin: Nker Ay AmaziY!
A wann ittinin: Mani nekka? Is nsul ad d-nuYul?
NniY-ak: Nekka-tt-nn nella, hat nella nsal ad nili!
Ddant tillas zrint AmaziY, tuwi-d ad diY yili,
Issker abadir g temẓin udu tent-ittetta uYyul!
NniY-ak akkwen adrar nezdeY dig-s dac a luḍa!
Ad as-nekkes iselliwen nessukef awd isennann.
A nerẓ ireẓẓan taf ad tessgem eetti Tuda
Tizizwa ad taweY g uleğig tzayed g iYran.
Ad tarew tamamt issidir ar tessegma Ayt Yafelman!
Ad tağ taṭfi-nnes g ifadden d wulawen i yifsan.
Akal-ddeY nna d-nufa a yiger ameqqran
Ad dig-ek nkerz irden imenza d mayed iYudan!
A nemger anli d imendi ur idd afar d isennann.
Meqqar ak-iẓil uleğig terẓagem ay alili!
Ira-kwen ugelzim qa k-ibbey issker dig-ek taduli.
Han azazer aqqurar hat afa ayed as-igan.
Zdem-t-id a yelli! Tra-t lkuccet naf lman!
NniY-ak ay AmaziY, asey tazert zuzzer aneṭṭar!
Zizdeg imendi, asi-t ssufeY-t ammas i unnar!
Dderf ssiweḍ-t-inn i teYzant kud isul ammas i udrar!
Isigniw-ddeY ibexxan timitar n tegniw
Ad d ur iferreY unẓar teẓaẓeḍ-t ad tiniḍ ibibiw
Unna mi tenniḍ gat afus a wi iYerm-inew
yini-yak ur k-sulaY i mayed ittaYen winew
DYi ay AmaziY nker,tisineḍ mayed ak-nniY!
Han ussan ur myaYen,meqqar d amm wass-lliY
Ferdedda-d hat tulid tifawt-nnek mek triḍ
Issudda wakal,anef allen takezḍ mani nn-triḍ.
Yaru-tt TANUMI g Tiṭṭawin
